original: thams cad bdag nyid gnas dbang phyug / bde ba dam pas de kho na //
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid gnas dbang phyug / bde ba dam pas de kho na //
translated: the supreme bliss, is just that.

original: dga' ba rtogs phyir rnam sangs rgyas//
analyzed: dga' ba rtogs phyir rnam sangs rgyas//
translated: Because of the realization of joy, there is complete buddhahood.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de bzhin du phyag rgya chen po thig le'i le'u brgyad pa las /
analyzed: de bzhin du phyag rgya chen po thig le'i le'u brgyad pa las /
translated: Similarly, in the Eight Chapters on the Drop of the Great Seal, it states:

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon //
translated: Now listen as I explain further:

original: rigs ni rigs lnga'i bdag nyid can //
analyzed: rigs ni rigs lnga'i bdag nyid can //
translated: The family is the nature of the five families.

original: rigs ni mthong ba zhes byar brjod //
analyzed: rigs ni mthong ba zhes byar brjod //
translated: The family is called ‚Äúthe seer.‚Äù

original: thod pa ka sogs nyid du 'dod //
analyzed: thod pa ka sogs nyid du 'dod //
translated: The skull is considered to be ‚Äúka‚Äù and so forth.

original: ka sogs 'dir ni rtsa bar shes //
analyzed: ka sogs 'dir ni rtsa bar shes //
translated: Here, ‚Äúka‚Äù and so forth are known to be the root.

original: rtsa ba rnam pa lngar ni 'dod //
analyzed: rtsa ba rnam pa lngar ni 'dod //
translated: The root is considered to be of five types.

original: lnga yi @66b bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs //üîΩphung po lnga yi rang bzhin skyes //
analyzed: lnga yi @66b bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs // phung po lnga yi rang bzhin skyes //
translated: The nature of the five is the tathagata.üîΩThe nature of the five aggregates is produced.

original: 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bor grags //
analyzed: 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bor grags //
translated: The essence of the five elements is renowned.üîΩThe supreme nature of the five wisdoms is Brahma, Vishnu, Rudra,

original: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid mchog / tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po dang // dbang phyug dang ni rtag zhi ba //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid mchog / tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po dang // dbang phyug dang ni rtag zhi ba //
translated: Ishvara, and Shiva.

original: dngos su 'di rnams skyed byed de //
analyzed: dngos su 'di rnams skyed byed de //
translated: These are the actual producers.

original: thod pa gang zhig de lnga 'dod //
analyzed: thod pa gang zhig de lnga 'dod //
translated: The skull is considered to be these five.

original: kun la khyab pa'i stong pa che //
analyzed: kun la khyab pa'i stong pa che //
translated: The great emptiness that pervades all

original: gcig pu ma skyes mi 'pho ba //
analyzed: gcig pu ma skyes mi 'pho ba //
translated: Not born, not transmigrating,

original: thod pa zhes bya 'od kyi gzugs //
analyzed: thod pa zhes bya 'od kyi gzugs //
translated: the skull is the form of light.

original: thams cad rdo rje 'chang bdag nyid //
analyzed: thams cad rdo rje 'chang bdag nyid //
translated: All are the nature of Vajradhara.

original: gang du snying rje btung ba ste //
analyzed: gang du snying rje btung ba ste //
translated: Where there is the drink of compassion,

original: dam tshig nyid kyang skyong ba dang // dan 'gro rnams las rgal ba yi //
analyzed: dam tshig nyid kyang skyong ba dang // dan 'gro rnams las rgal ba yi //
translated: and also the protection of the commitments,

original: thod pa de ni rab tu bsngags //
analyzed: thod pa de ni rab tu bsngags //
translated: the skull is praised asüîΩthe crossing over of transmigrators.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni lhan cig skyes//
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni lhan cig skyes//
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes the innate.

original: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas te //
analyzed: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas te //
translated: Ka does not abide anywhere.

original: de nyid rdo rje'i ngo bo yis //
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje'i ngo bo yis //
translated: By the nature of that very vajra,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo nyid du gnas //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo nyid du gnas //
translated: it abides in the dharmacakra.

original: mgrin pa'i 'khor lo rtag zhi ba //
analyzed: mgrin pa'i 'khor lo rtag zhi ba //
translated: The wheel of the throat is always peaceful.

original: spyi bor de yi bdag po gnas //
analyzed: spyi bor de yi bdag po gnas //
translated: The lord of that abides in the head.

original: drag po lte ba'i 'khor lor gnas //
analyzed: drag po lte ba'i 'khor lor gnas //
translated: Rudra abides in the navel chakra.

original: de yi 'og tu tshangs pa gnas //
analyzed: de yi 'og tu tshangs pa gnas //
translated: Below that, BrahmƒÅ abides.

original: khyab 'jug rlung gi 'khor lor gnas //
analyzed: khyab 'jug rlung gi 'khor lor gnas //
translated: Vi·π£·πáu abides in the wind chakra.

original: me sogs rnams la zhugs pa'i phyir //üîΩbdag ni 'khor lo thams cad la //
analyzed: me sogs rnams la zhugs pa'i phyir // bdag ni 'khor lo thams cad la //
translated: Because of entering fire and so on,üîΩI am the lord

original: bdag po yi ni rnam par gnas //
analyzed: bdag po yi ni rnam par gnas //
translated: who abides in all the chakras.

original: stong pa chen po'i ngo bor grags //
analyzed: stong pa chen po'i ngo bor grags //
translated: I am renowned as the essence of the great emptiness.

original: mkha' 'gro ma yis kun nas bskor //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yis kun nas bskor //
translated: surrounded by the dakinis.

original: mkha' 'gro lnga sogs bdag po ste //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro lnga sogs bdag po ste //
translated: The five dakinis and so forth are the lords,

original: ye shes mkha' 'gro dbang phyug mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: ye shes mkha' 'gro dbang phyug mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: the dakini of wisdom is the supreme goddess.

original: de ltar rin po che rnam pa lnga skyed par byed pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rin po che rnam pa lnga skyed par byed pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the generation of the five jewels,

original: de nyid kyi don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain the ultimate nature of that,

original: yi ge med cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: yi ge med cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, ‚Äúwithout syllables,‚Äù and so forth.

original: mes po nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mes po nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the grandfather.

original: gong du bud med ces bya ba ni mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir phyi rol gyi longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ltar 'byung ba'i tshogs ni rnam par spangs zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku nyid kyi phyir zhes dga' ba'i
analyzed: gong du bud med ces bya ba ni mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir phyi rol gyi longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ltar 'byung ba'i tshogs ni rnam par spangs zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku nyid kyi phyir zhes dga' ba'i
translated: Above, ‚Äúwoman‚Äù is the generation of the major and minor marks, and so forth. ‚Äú The assembly of appearances is abandoned‚Äù because it is the enjoyment body.

original: 'od kyi phreng ba byed pa mkhan pos so //
analyzed: 'od kyi phreng ba byed pa mkhan pos so //
translated: The garland of light is made by the master.

original: yang na yi ge med cing zhes bya ba ni chos nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na yi ge med cing zhes bya ba ni chos nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Or else, it is said to be ‚Äúwithout syllables‚Äù because of the nature of reality.

original: gong bu med cing zhes bya ba ni gong bu'i ngo bo cig tu med pa'i phyir dang / chos thams cad la khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gong bu med cing zhes bya ba ni gong bu'i ngo bo cig tu med pa'i phyir dang / chos thams cad la khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is said to be ‚Äúwithout a body‚Äù because it is not a single entity of a body and because it pervades all phenomena.

original: 'byung ba'i tshogs ni rnam par spangs //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i tshogs ni rnam par spangs //
translated: The collection of elements is abandoned.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba dang 'byung chung gi ngo bo'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba dang 'byung chung gi ngo bo'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is no concept of the nature of the elements and the subtle elements.

original: de la 'byung ba ni 'khor lo drug gi ngo bo ste /üîΩ'byung ba las 'gyur ba ni de rnams @67a * //
analyzed: de la 'byung ba ni 'khor lo drug gi ngo bo ste / 'byung ba las 'gyur ba ni de rnams @67a * //
translated: In this regard, the elements are the nature of the six wheels.

original: la sngags kyi yi ge la sogs pa rnams te /
analyzed: la sngags kyi yi ge la sogs pa rnams te /
translated: The elements and the derivatives are the syllables of the mantra and so on in those wheels.

original: spros pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: spros pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because they are free of conceptual elaborations.

original: cha med cas bya ba ni spro ba'i rim pas a'a li dang k'a li mi bskyod pas so //
analyzed: cha med cas bya ba ni spro ba'i rim pas a'a li dang k'a li mi bskyod pas so //
translated: It is said to be ‚Äúpartless‚Äù because the vowels and consonants are not generated by Ak·π£obhya through the process of emanation.

original: cha las 'das zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i yul ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: cha las 'das zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i yul ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is said to be ‚Äúbeyond parts‚Äù because it is not an object of conceptuality.

original: skye med ces bya ba ni gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: skye med ces bya ba ni gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúUnborn‚Äù means that the nature of reality is essentially unborn from the beginning.

original: zad med ces bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rtag tu gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zad med ces bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rtag tu gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúImperishable‚Äù means that it is essentially permanent.

original: chos rnams thams cad las de dang gzhan nyid du brjod du med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad las de dang gzhan nyid du brjod du med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúNeither the same nor different‚Äù means that it cannot be expressed as being either the same as or different from all phenomena.

original: kun 'dzin ces bya ba ni yod pa dang med pa dang dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i spros pa las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun 'dzin ces bya ba ni yod pa dang med pa dang dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i spros pa las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúAll-embracing‚Äù means that it transcends the elaborations of existence and nonexistence, entity and nonentity.

original: mngon zhen la sogs spangs zhes bya ba ni rjod byed kyi sgra'i mtshan nyid rnams kyis so //
analyzed: mngon zhen la sogs spangs zhes bya ba ni rjod byed kyi sgra'i mtshan nyid rnams kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúFree from clinging, etc.‚Äù means that it is free from the characteristics of the expressive terms.

original: spangs zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi yul ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: spangs zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi yul ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúFree‚Äù means that it is not the object of those.

original: lhag ma ni khyad par gyi chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: lhag ma ni khyad par gyi chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The remaining [lines] are the essence of the special qualities.

original: de med pas lhag ma med pa'o //
analyzed: de med pas lhag ma med pa'o //
translated: Since it does not exist, it is without remainder.

original: mchog ni mchog ste zhes bya ba ni rgyud kyi rim pa'i yi ge aa las shin tu mchog nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog ni mchog ste zhes bya ba ni rgyud kyi rim pa'i yi ge aa las shin tu mchog nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Supreme is supreme, that is, it is the supreme of the supreme due to the letter A in the sequence of the tantra.

original: zhi ba ni zhes bya ba ni shin tu zhi ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhi ba ni zhes bya ba ni shin tu zhi ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Peace is peace, that is, it is peace due to being extremely peaceful.

original: dngos po kun gyi dbus na gnas //
analyzed: dngos po kun gyi dbus na gnas //
translated: It abides in the middle of all things,

original: zhes bya ba ni chos rnams yongs su spangs nas mi gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chos rnams yongs su spangs nas mi gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: that is, it does not abide in the abandonment of phenomena.

original: de ltar de nyid kyi don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid mngon par brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar de nyid kyi don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid mngon par brjod nas /
translated: Having thus expressed the meaning of reality itself,

original: rnam shes gsum gyi skye ba bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /üîΩ'jug pa'i rnam shes tshogs drug gis //
analyzed: rnam shes gsum gyi skye ba bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir / 'jug pa'i rnam shes tshogs drug gis //
translated: in order to express the teaching on the arising of the three consciousnesses,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚ÄúThe six collections of engaging consciousnesses,‚Äù and so on.

original: mig la sogs pa'i rnam shes drug la'o //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i rnam shes drug la'o //
translated: The six collections of consciousnesses of the eyes and so on.

original: khyab byed du ni yang dag gnas //
analyzed: khyab byed du ni yang dag gnas //
translated: It abides pervasively,

original: zhes bya ba ni lte ba la gnas pa'i aa'i yi ge'i ngo bo la brtan nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lte ba la gnas pa'i aa'i yi ge'i ngo bo la brtan nas /
translated: that is, having stabilized the essence of the letter A that abides in the navel,

original: 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa sad pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa sad pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: in order to generate the arising of the engaging consciousnesses.

original: nyon mongs can gyi yid ces bya ba ni bdag tu lta ba dang / bdag la chags pa dang / bdag tu rmongs pa dang / bdag tu nga rgyal ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnam pa bzhin rtag tu 'dud pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs can gyi yid ces bya ba ni bdag tu lta ba dang / bdag la chags pa dang / bdag tu rmongs pa dang / bdag tu nga rgyal ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnam pa bzhin rtag tu 'dud pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The so-called afflicted mind is always bent on the four aspects of the view of self, attachment to self, delusion regarding self, and pride in self.

original: sngon bzhin du khyab byed nyid du gnas pa zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sngon bzhin du khyab byed nyid du gnas pa zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: As before, the word ‚Äúabides‚Äù should be supplied.

original: gal te khyab byed yin na /
analyzed: gal te khyab byed yin na /
translated: If it is the pervader,üîΩthen it would be affected by the faults of the pervaded.

original: 'o na de'i skyon rnams kyis 'di nye bar bsgos par 'gyur ro snyam du dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'o na de'i skyon rnams kyis 'di nye bar bsgos par 'gyur ro snyam du dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: To dispel this doubt, he says,

original: rnam rtog med cing zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rnam rtog med cing zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: ‚Äúwithout discursive thought.‚Äù

original: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog @67b pa rnams kyis ma bsgos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog @67b pa rnams kyis ma bsgos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not affected by the discursive thoughts of the afflicted mind consciousness, etc.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rten med pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rten med pa ste /
translated: For that very reason, it is ‚Äúwithout a basis,‚Äù

original: don dam par nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa la sogs ba mi 'thad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam par nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa la sogs ba mi 'thad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because ultimately the afflicted mind consciousness, etc., are not tenable.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: Likewise,

original: kun gzhi rnam shes gsungs pa'i phyir //üîΩzhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi sa bon la'o //
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam shes gsungs pa'i phyir // zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi sa bon la'o //
translated: because the foundation consciousness is taught,üîΩit is said that the foundation consciousness is the cause of the arising of the various consciousnesses.

original: sad par byed ces bya ba ni rab tu sad par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sad par byed ces bya ba ni rab tu sad par byed pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Awakened‚Äù means fully awakened.

original: phyi rol gyi sad par byed pa'i rkyen mi 'thad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi sad par byed pa'i rkyen mi 'thad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because external conditions that awaken are not tenable.

original: de'i bag chags sad pa la de'i rten nyid yin no //
analyzed: de'i bag chags sad pa la de'i rten nyid yin no //
translated: The latent impressions of that are the basis for that.

original: bems po nyid ni zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa mi rigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bems po nyid ni zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa mi rigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚Äú Inert‚Äù means that it is not reasonable to objectify.

original: de ltar rnam pa gsum gyis de la gnas skabs kyi dbye ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa gsum gyis de la gnas skabs kyi dbye ba bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the classification of states in three ways,

original: de thob pa'i rgyu bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /üîΩmchog tu gnyid med rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: de thob pa'i rgyu bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir / mchog tu gnyid med rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: in order to teach the cause of attaining that,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúBy the yoga of supreme non-sleep,‚Äù and so on.

original: nang gi bdag nyid can gyi thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mchog tu phyi rol gyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i rnal 'byor gyis thob par bya'o //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid can gyi thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mchog tu phyi rol gyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i rnal 'byor gyis thob par bya'o //
translated: It should be attained by the yoga of supreme non-sleep, which has the nature of inner union of method and wisdom, and is free from the characteristics of external sleep.

original: yi ge zhes bya ba ni aa yig gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: yi ge zhes bya ba ni aa yig gi ngo bo'o //
translated: The syllable is the essence of the letter A.

original: bla na med ces bya ba ni bla na med pa'i go 'phang gi rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bla na med ces bya ba ni bla na med pa'i go 'phang gi rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Unsurpassed means that it is the cause of the unsurpassed state.

original: rtog med ces bya ba ni don dam par 'gro ba dang 'ong pa'i bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog med ces bya ba ni don dam par 'gro ba dang 'ong pa'i bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Nonconceptual means that ultimately there is no activity of going and coming.

original: 'jigs med ces bya ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jigs med ces bya ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Fearless means that it is free from the fear of passion and so forth.

original: gsal ba dang zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i gnas su rnal 'byor pa'i ye shes gsal bar rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba dang zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i gnas su rnal 'byor pa'i ye shes gsal bar rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Clear means that the yogin's wisdom is realized clearly in the navel.

original: rlung gi de nyid yang dag brten //
analyzed: rlung gi de nyid yang dag brten //
translated: The reality of the wind is well-established.

original: zhes bya ba ni las kyi rlung la brten nas thig le gsum bsgoms pa'i sgo nas rtogs par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni las kyi rlung la brten nas thig le gsum bsgoms pa'i sgo nas rtogs par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This means that it is to be realized by means of the meditation on the three drops in dependence on the karma-wind.

original: ho yig gis ni bskul byas nas //
analyzed: ho yig gis ni bskul byas nas //
translated: Having been urged by the letter Ho.

original: zhes bya ba ni smin ma'i dbus su rlung gi 'khor lo gnas pa'i yi ge ho thig le'i dbye ba ngo bos yang dag par bskul pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni smin ma'i dbus su rlung gi 'khor lo gnas pa'i yi ge ho thig le'i dbye ba ngo bos yang dag par bskul pa ste /
translated: This means that the letter Ho, which is located in the middle of the eyebrows in the wind-wheel, is well-urged by the essence of the division of the drops.

original: steng du 'gro ba bkag nas 'og tu 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: steng du 'gro ba bkag nas 'og tu 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is blocked from going upward and goes downward.

original: me yi 'khor lo rnam par sbyong //
analyzed: me yi 'khor lo rnam par sbyong //
translated: The fire wheel is purified.

original: zhes bya ba ni mgrin pa'i 'og tu gnas pa'i me'i 'khor lo rab tu sad par byed pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mgrin pa'i 'og tu gnas pa'i me'i 'khor lo rab tu sad par byed pa ste /
translated: This is the arousal of the fire wheel located below the throat.

original: 'og dang steng sprul pa dang me'i 'khor lo rab tu sad pas rtsa'i 'khor lo ma lus pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'og dang steng sprul pa dang me'i 'khor lo rab tu sad pas rtsa'i 'khor lo ma lus pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the lower and upper wheels of emanation and fire are aroused, all conceptual thoughts of the channel wheels are destroyed.

original: de ltar de thob par byed pa'i rgyu brjod par bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar de thob par byed pa'i rgyu brjod par bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the cause for attaining that,

original: nye bar bsdu ba bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: nye bar bsdu ba bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain the summary,

original: de ltar sgra'i tshig gi don zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de ltar sgra'i tshig gi don zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúThus, the meaning of the words of the sound,‚ÄùüîΩand so on.

original: le'u dang @68a * //üîΩpor dri ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi gsungs pa la'o //
analyzed: le'u dang @68a * // por dri ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi gsungs pa la'o //
translated: The chapterüîΩis the subject matter.

original: don zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ba'i ngo bo la'o //
analyzed: don zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ba'i ngo bo la'o //
translated: The meaning is the nature of the object of expression.

original: bla ma'i zhal zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi zhal la'o //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi zhal la'o //
translated: The guru‚Äôs mouth is the teacher‚Äôs mouth.

original: rnam par gnas zhes bya ba ni de'i drin gyis thob par bya ba nyid kyi phyir snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par gnas zhes bya ba ni de'i drin gyis thob par bya ba nyid kyi phyir snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: The phrase abiding in that means that one should think, I have attained this through his kindness.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel ba /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel ba /
translated: The commentary on the glorious Vajra Garland, the great yoga tantra,

original: pandi ta aa langka ka la shas mdzad pa /
analyzed: pandi ta aa langka ka la shas mdzad pa /
translated: composed by the pa·πá·∏çita Ala·πÉkakala≈õa,

original: zab mo'i don gsal ba zhes bya ba las le'u bdun pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
analyzed: zab mo'i don gsal ba zhes bya ba las le'u bdun pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
translated: is called Illuminating the Profound Meaning.

original: // / de ltar le'u bdun pas sgra'i yul la dri ba'i lan brjod pa bstan nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar le'u bdun pas sgra'i yul la dri ba'i lan brjod pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the reply to the question about the domain of sound in chapter 7,

original: da ni skabs su bab pa'i gsang ba'i yul la dri ba'i lan bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni skabs su bab pa'i gsang ba'i yul la dri ba'i lan bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain the reply to the question about the domain of the secret, which is the appropriate context,

original: de'i dri ba'i lan bshad par rtsom pa ni de nas gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i dri ba'i lan bshad par rtsom pa ni de nas gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: the reply to that question is begun with the words ‚Äúafter that, again.‚Äù

original: le'u bdun pa'i rjes la gsang ba bshad kyis nyon zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: le'u bdun pa'i rjes la gsang ba bshad kyis nyon zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: This is connected with the words ‚Äúlisten to the explanation of the secret after chapter 7.‚Äù

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: de'i phyir bla na med pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bla na med pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, ‚Äúunsurpassed‚Äù is stated.

original: 'di las gong na med pa'i phyir bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di las gong na med pa'i phyir bla na med pa'o //
translated: Since there is nothing higher than this, it is unsurpassed.

original: de ltar gsang ba'i yul la dri ba'i lan brjod pa rtsom pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar gsang ba'i yul la dri ba'i lan brjod pa rtsom pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus begun the explanation of the reply to the question about the secret domain,

original: dngos su gsang ba bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos su gsang ba bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to directly explain the secret,

original: de'i yan lag rang gi ngo bo'i dbye ba gtso bo ma yin pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i yan lag rang gi ngo bo'i dbye ba gtso bo ma yin pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the secret that is not the primary division of its own nature,

original: gsang ba bha ga zhes ni gsungs //üîΩzhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gsang ba bha ga zhes ni gsungs // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: the secret is said to be the bhaga.

original: nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pa'i phyir dang / dam tshig dang mi ldan pa rnams la bstan par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pa'i phyir dang / dam tshig dang mi ldan pa rnams la bstan par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it destroys the afflictions and because it should not be taught to those who do not possess the commitments.

original: bha ga chos 'byung de bzhin te //
analyzed: bha ga chos 'byung de bzhin te //
translated: The bhaga is the source of phenomena.

original: zhes bya ba ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched bskyed pa'i gnas nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched bskyed pa'i gnas nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the source of the generation of the aggregates, elements, and sense bases.

original: chos rnams 'di las skyes pas na'o //
analyzed: chos rnams 'di las skyes pas na'o //
translated: Because phenomena are born from this.

original: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang rten //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang rten //
translated: The support of the state of great bliss.

original: zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i ngo bo byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis la mngon par gsal ba'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir dang / de yang dag par rten pa'i stobs kyis de dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i ngo bo byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis la mngon par gsal ba'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir dang / de yang dag par rten pa'i stobs kyis de dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The cause of the manifest appearance of the two kinds of bodhicitta, relative and ultimate, and also the cause of the support of that, because of the power of that support, that is, the cause of the object of that.

original: dga' ba skyed par byed pa'i rgyu ;
analyzed: dga' ba skyed par byed pa'i rgyu ;
translated: The cause of the generation of joy.

original: / zhes bya ba ni bde ba cung zad dang / de las lhag pa dang / de dang bral ba dang / thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan gyi brgyud pa'i rgyu dang / dngos kyi rgyu dang / de 'jig pa dang / bde ba thams cad kyi mchog gi ngo bo dga' ba la sogs pa rnams bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: / zhes bya ba ni bde ba cung zad dang / de las lhag pa dang / de dang bral ba dang / thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan gyi brgyud pa'i rgyu dang / dngos kyi rgyu dang / de 'jig pa dang / bde ba thams cad kyi mchog gi ngo bo dga' ba la sogs pa rnams bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
translated: The cause of the generation of joy, etc., is the cause of the sequence of the signs of the slight bliss, the bliss beyond that, the separation from that, and the complete perfection of all, the direct cause, the cause of the destruction of that, and the cause of the generation of the joy, etc., which are the nature of the supreme of all blisses.

original: @68b ji skad du /
analyzed: @68b ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: dga' ba'i bde ba cung zad tsam //
analyzed: dga' ba'i bde ba cung zad tsam //
translated: The slight bliss is joy.üîΩSupreme joy is beyond that.

original: mchog tu dga' ba de las lhag / dga' bral dga' ba chags pa bral //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba de las lhag / dga' bral dga' ba chags pa bral //
translated: The joy of separation from joy is free from passion.

original: de nas bzhi pa bsgom par bya //
analyzed: de nas bzhi pa bsgom par bya //
translated: Then one should cultivate the fourth.

original: de ltar na gtso bo ma yin pa'i gsang pa'i man ngag bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar na gtso bo ma yin pa'i gsang pa'i man ngag bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the secret intimate instruction that is not the main point,

original: de las bzlog pa'i bde ba'i ngo bo gsang ba'i man ngag bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa'i bde ba'i ngo bo gsang ba'i man ngag bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain the secret intimate instruction that is the opposite of that, the nature of bliss,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: it is said, ‚Äúthe place of Vajrasattva.‚Äù

original: dpe'i lhan cig skyes pa la bla ma'i gdams ngag gi dbang gis lhan cig skyes pa snyam du zhen pa byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i don dam pa la /
analyzed: dpe'i lhan cig skyes pa la bla ma'i gdams ngag gi dbang gis lhan cig skyes pa snyam du zhen pa byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i don dam pa la /
translated: In the example of the connate, through the guru‚Äôs instruction, one should think of the connate and imagine it.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i rnam pa'i rten ni de la brten nas de dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i rnam pa'i rten ni de la brten nas de dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The support of the ultimate Vajrasattva is the support of the mahƒÅmudrƒÅ aspect because it is observed in dependence on that.

original: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang chos rnams gnas pa'i rnam pas yongs su shes pa'i phyir me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang chos rnams gnas pa'i rnam pas yongs su shes pa'i phyir me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
translated: The five pristine consciousnesses are the mirror-like pristine consciousness because all buddhas and phenomena are completely known by the aspect of abiding.

original: rkang med la sogs pa'i sems can rnam pa bzhi phyag rgya chen po dang khyad par med pa nyid kyis thams cad du bde ba'i rnam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: rkang med la sogs pa'i sems can rnam pa bzhi phyag rgya chen po dang khyad par med pa nyid kyis thams cad du bde ba'i rnam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: The gnosis of the form of bliss in all circumstances is the great seal, because of the non-difference of the four kinds of beings, the legless, etc., from the great seal.

original: dus thams cad du bde ba'i rnam pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: dus thams cad du bde ba'i rnam pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The gnosis of the form of bliss in all circumstances is the individually discerning gnosis.

original: rang gis rtogs pa'i de kho na nyid gzhan rnams la yang thabs de nyid kyis de kho na nyid la spyod pa ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: rang gis rtogs pa'i de kho na nyid gzhan rnams la yang thabs de nyid kyis de kho na nyid la spyod pa ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The gnosis of successful action is the practice of reality by others through the same method by which one has oneself realized reality.

original: sna tshogs pa'i 'du shes bzlog pas shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i 'du shes bzlog pas shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin te /
translated: The nature of the utterly pure realm of truth is the reversal of the notion of variety.

original: nam mkha' lnga'i bdag nyid ces bya ba'i gzhung yang yod de /
analyzed: nam mkha' lnga'i bdag nyid ces bya ba'i gzhung yang yod de /
translated: There is also the text, ‚ÄúThe nature of the five spaces.‚Äù

original: de'i phyogs la ni rtsa'i nam mkha' chos 'byung nang du gnas pa rtsa'i nam mkha' lngas 'gro bar bya ba nyid bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyogs la ni rtsa'i nam mkha' chos 'byung nang du gnas pa rtsa'i nam mkha' lngas 'gro bar bya ba nyid bshad par bya'o //
translated: In that context, the space of the channels, which is located in the inner source, should be explained as the five spaces of the channels that are to be traversed.

original: gsal zhes bya ba ni lag mthil du skyu ru ra bzhag pa ltar gsal ba'i ngo bos dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal zhes bya ba ni lag mthil du skyu ru ra bzhag pa ltar gsal ba'i ngo bos dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is clear because it is perceived by the essence of clarity, like a myrobalan fruit placed in the palm of the hand.

original: spros pa med ces bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir dang / yod pa dang med pa las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spros pa med ces bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir dang / yod pa dang med pa las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is free from conceptual elaboration because it surpasses the counteragent and because it transcends existence and non-existence.

original: ye shes chen po zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩkun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
analyzed: ye shes chen po zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid kyi phyir ro // kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
translated: It is great intuition because it is supramundane.

original: zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid dang ye shes kyi rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis ma gos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid dang ye shes kyi rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis ma gos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is free from all conceptualization because it is uncontaminated by the conceptualizations of body, speech, mind, and intuition.

original: dga' bral mtha' zhes bya ba ni dga' bral ba'i mtha' nyid kyi phyir te /üîΩ'jig rten pa'i rjes su 'brangs pas so //
analyzed: dga' bral mtha' zhes bya ba ni dga' bral ba'i mtha' nyid kyi phyir te / 'jig rten pa'i rjes su 'brangs pas so //
translated: It is the limit of the separation from joy because it is the limit of the separation from joy.

original: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'brangs pas so //
analyzed: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'brangs pas so //
translated: It is supreme because it is the limit of the supreme, following the mundane.

original: dga' bral dang de ma thag tu nyams su myong ba'i @69a * //
analyzed: dga' bral dang de ma thag tu nyams su myong ba'i @69a * //
translated: It is the joy of the separation from joy because it is the joy of the separation from joy.

original: phyir ro // phra zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas rang gis rig par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: phyir ro // phra zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas rang gis rig par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the object of the yogi's own intuition.

original: lhan cig skyes zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo'i lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba nyid kyis rgyu rkyen las ma skyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo'i lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba nyid kyis rgyu rkyen las ma skyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is innate because it is not produced from causes and conditions, since it is free from the innate characteristics of the ordinary man.

original: kun bdag gnas zhes bya ba ni dga' ba gsum la khyab pa nyid kyis gnas pa'o //
analyzed: kun bdag gnas zhes bya ba ni dga' ba gsum la khyab pa nyid kyis gnas pa'o //
translated: It is the universal abode because it pervades the three joys.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: yang na kun bdag gnas nyid de //üîΩyang na thams cad rnam par spangs //
analyzed: yang na kun bdag gnas nyid de // yang na thams cad rnam par spangs //
translated: Or it is the universal abode,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Or it is the total abandonment.üîΩThe moments of the separation from joy and so forth are the principal causes of the separation from joy and so forth, and they are the same in nature as the cause.

original: dga' bral la sogs pa'i skad cig ma zhes bya ba ni dga' bral la sogs pa rnams kyis ji ltar rigs par gtso bo'i rgyu dang rgyu gcig pa'i ngo bo dang ; skad cig ni rnam pa sna tshogs la sogs pa rnams dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: dga' bral la sogs pa'i skad cig ma zhes bya ba ni dga' bral la sogs pa rnams kyis ji ltar rigs par gtso bo'i rgyu dang rgyu gcig pa'i ngo bo dang ; skad cig ni rnam pa sna tshogs la sogs pa rnams dang bral ba'o //
translated: The moment is free from the various aspects and so forth.

original: de'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is characterized by the absence of those characteristics.

original: phra ba zhes bya ba ni phra ba'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phra ba zhes bya ba ni phra ba'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subtle means that it is subtle for the subtle yogis.

original: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ni yid //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ni yid //
translated: The mind of perfect enlightenment

original: ces bya ba ni don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: means the ultimate mind of enlightenment.

original: srog la phan par 'tsho ba zhes bya ba ni srog gi dbang po'i mtshan nyid can la'o //
analyzed: srog la phan par 'tsho ba zhes bya ba ni srog gi dbang po'i mtshan nyid can la'o //
translated: Living for the sake of life means that it has the characteristic of the faculty of life.

original: de nyid kyi phyir srog ces bya ba ni /üîΩsrang mda'i 'khrul 'khor lta bur gnas //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir srog ces bya ba ni / srang mda'i 'khrul 'khor lta bur gnas //
translated: Therefore, life isüîΩlike a scale.

original: zhes bya ba ni rtse gsum la reg pas rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rtse gsum la reg pas rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is like a scale because it is realized by touching the trident.

original: cha med ces bya ba ni cha bco lnga'i zla ba'i cha las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cha med ces bya ba ni cha bco lnga'i zla ba'i cha las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Partless means that it is beyond the parts of the fifteen-part moon.

original: rtog pa las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni ngag gi rnam par rtog pa'i sgra'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog pa las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni ngag gi rnam par rtog pa'i sgra'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Beyond thought means that it is not an object of verbal thought.

original: stong nyid ces bya ba ni rtag tu de nyid yod pas ma bcos pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: stong nyid ces bya ba ni rtag tu de nyid yod pas ma bcos pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Emptiness means that it is always thatness, because it is the nature of the unfabricated.

original: skye med ces bya ba ni ngag gi rnam par rtog pa'i sgra'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye med ces bya ba ni ngag gi rnam par rtog pa'i sgra'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúUnborn‚Äù means that it is not an object of the domain of the speech-conceptualization sound.

original: zad pa med ces bya ba ni 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zad pa med ces bya ba ni 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúNot exhausted‚Äù means that it is not destroyed.

original: de yang skye ba nyid med pa'i phyir zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de yang skye ba nyid med pa'i phyir zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: And that is to be connected with ‚Äúbecause of the absence of birth itself.‚Äù

original: de ltar don dam pa'i bde ba'i ngo bo gsang ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar don dam pa'i bde ba'i ngo bo gsang ba bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the secret of the nature of ultimate bliss,

original: kun rdzob kyi byang chub sems kyi ngo bo gsang ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi byang chub sems kyi ngo bo gsang ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the secret of the nature of relative bodhicitta,

original: sprul pa'i 'khor lo thim pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
analyzed: sprul pa'i 'khor lo thim pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚Äúthe dissolution of the emanation wheel,‚Äù and so forth.

original: thim pa dang zhes bya ba ni /üîΩbde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la //
analyzed: thim pa dang zhes bya ba ni / bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la //
translated: ‚ÄúDissolution‚Äù meansüîΩthat the moon of mind falls

original: sems kyi zla ba ltung bar gyur pa las /
analyzed: sems kyi zla ba ltung bar gyur pa las /
translated: into the great-bliss wheel,

original: de dang nye bar gnas pa'i gsang ba'i 'khor lo gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de dang nye bar gnas pa'i gsang ba'i 'khor lo gnas pa'o //
translated: and abides in the secret wheel that is adjacent to it.

original: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo skye //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo skye //
translated: ‚ÄúThe great-bliss wheel arises‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni mgo bo'i gnas nas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mgo bo'i gnas nas so //
translated: means that [the mind] arises from the place of the head.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba ni me long lta @69b bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba ni me long lta @69b bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúInconceivable‚Äù means that it is the nature of mirror-like primordial wisdom.

original: kunda dang zla ba dag pa dang 'dra ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: kunda dang zla ba dag pa dang 'dra ba nyid kyis so //
translated: It is ‚Äúlike a pure crystal or the moon.‚Äù

original: khyab ces bya ba ni khams sum cu rtsa gnyis ro mnyam pa las mnyam pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab ces bya ba ni khams sum cu rtsa gnyis ro mnyam pa las mnyam pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúPervasive‚Äù means that it is the nature of the primordial wisdom of equality, which is of one taste with the thirty-two elements.

original: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa nye bar zhi bas so //
analyzed: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa nye bar zhi bas so //
translated: ‚ÄúPeaceful‚Äù means that it is the nature of discriminating primordial wisdom, which is the pacification of discursive thought.

original: cha bral zhes bya ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyi phyir bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: cha bral zhes bya ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyi phyir bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúPartless‚Äù means that it is the nature of all-accomplishing primordial wisdom, which is the nature of discriminating primordial wisdom.

original: mchog ces bya ni mchog ni bde ba bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩrdo rje padma mnyam sbyor rtogs //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ni mchog ni bde ba bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro // rdo rje padma mnyam sbyor rtogs //
translated: ‚ÄúSupreme‚Äù means that it is the nature of the primordial wisdom of the dharmadhƒÅtu, which is the cause of the supreme bliss.

original: zhes bya ba ni dbang po gnyis kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i sbyor bas nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dbang po gnyis kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i sbyor bas nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThe union of the vajra and lotus‚Äù means that it is experienced through the union of the two organs.

original: bde ba thams cad ster zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba thams cad ster zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par byed pa'o //

original: rlung gi de nyid 'dzin pa yis //
analyzed: rlung gi de nyid 'dzin pa yis //
translated: By holding the reality of the wind,

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang padma'i nam mkha' la'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang padma'i nam mkha' la'o //
translated: means in the space of the vajra and lotus.

original: 'dzin par byed ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dzin par byed ces bya ba ni /
translated: Holding means

original: bya dhye'i sa bon bkod pa 'am /
analyzed: bya dhye'i sa bon bkod pa 'am /

original: sa ni rkang pas mnan byas zhes bya ba'i rim pa'am /
analyzed: sa ni rkang pas mnan byas zhes bya ba'i rim pa'am /
translated: or the stage of the earth is pressed by the foot,

original: dngos su rlung bzung ba'i stobs kyis so //
analyzed: dngos su rlung bzung ba'i stobs kyis so //

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: rlung gi de nyid rig pa yis //
analyzed: rlung gi de nyid rig pa yis //
translated: by knowing the reality of the wind,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so on.

original: gang de skye ba nyams myong bas //
analyzed: gang de skye ba nyams myong bas //

original: zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo rnams dang 'phags pa rnams kyis rang gis rig par bya'o //üîΩgsang ba yis ni bya bar grags //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo rnams dang 'phags pa rnams kyis rang gis rig par bya'o // gsang ba yis ni bya bar grags //
translated: means that it should be known by oneself by ordinary beings and ƒÅryas.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is renowned as being done by the secret.

original: yi ger dang ha dag gis 'dzag pa'i phyir na gnas pa'o zhes bya bar grags so //
analyzed: yi ger dang ha dag gis 'dzag pa'i phyir na gnas pa'o zhes bya bar grags so //

original: de ltar don dam pa gsum gyis dngos su de brjod pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar don dam pa gsum gyis dngos su de brjod pa bstan nas /

analyzed: nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /

analyzed: de nyid gsang ba yi ni mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he declares, ‚Äúthe supreme secret of that,‚Äù and so on.

original: de ma thag par bstan pa'i rigs pas brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de ma thag par bstan pa'i rigs pas brjod pa'o //

original: mchog ces bya ba ni nyams su myong ba'i rim pas rig par bya ba nyid kye phyir mchog go //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni nyams su myong ba'i rim pas rig par bya ba nyid kye phyir mchog go //

original: bla ma'i zhal la rnam par gnas //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal la rnam par gnas //
translated: ‚Äú Resides in the guru‚Äôs mouth‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i brgyud pas bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i brgyud pas bsgrub par bya'o //

original: phan tshun brgyud pa'i rim pa yis //
analyzed: phan tshun brgyud pa'i rim pa yis //
translated: ‚Äú Through the stage of the lineage of mutual transmission‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das nas brtsams te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das nas brtsams te /

analyzed: ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i zhal gyi rim pas bla ma'i zhal gyi rim pa la gnas so //

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir ye shes gsungs te zhes bya ba ni rjes su btsal bar bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Therefore, it is said to be timeless awareness‚Äù means it is to be sought.

original: bla ba dam pa'i zhal zhes bya ba ni rgyud du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyi brgyud pas zhes bya @70a * //
analyzed: bla ba dam pa'i zhal zhes bya ba ni rgyud du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyi brgyud pas zhes bya @70a * //
translated: The ‚Äúface of the excellent guru‚Äù means the lineage of the master who possesses the characteristics taught in the tantra.

original: ba'i don to //
analyzed: ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of ‚Äúlineage.‚Äù

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /

original: pandi ta aa langka ka la shas mdzad pa /
analyzed: pandi ta aa langka ka la shas mdzad pa /
translated: by the pa·πá·∏çita Ala·πÉkakala≈õa

original: zab mo'i don gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba las le'u brgyad pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
analyzed: zab mo'i don gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba las le'u brgyad pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
translated: The Lamp for the Profound Meaning, the Commentary on the Eighth Chapter

original: // / de ltar le'u brgyad pas gsang ba'i yul la dri ba'i lan bstan pa brjod nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar le'u brgyad pas gsang ba'i yul la dri ba'i lan bstan pa brjod nas /
translated: Having thus described the reply to the question about the secret domain in the eighth chapter,

original: da ni skabs su bab pa'i sdom pa'i yul la dri ba'i lan gdab pa brjod pa dri ba de'i lan bshad par rtsom pa ni /
analyzed: da ni skabs su bab pa'i sdom pa'i yul la dri ba'i lan gdab pa brjod pa dri ba de'i lan bshad par rtsom pa ni /
translated: now, beginning the explanation of the reply to the question about the domain of the vow that is the present context, it says:üîΩThen,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so on.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni snga ma la ltos nas so //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni snga ma la ltos nas so //
translated: ‚ÄúAlso‚Äù is in reference to the previous.

original: sdom pa'i don zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi theg pa'i sdom pa'i don bshad kyis nyon zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: sdom pa'i don zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi theg pa'i sdom pa'i don bshad kyis nyon zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: The meaning of the vow is the meaning of the vow of the Mantra Vehicle.

original: de kho na nyid ces bya ba ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i rnam pa'i de kho na nyid la brten nas shes par bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ces bya ba ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i rnam pa'i de kho na nyid la brten nas shes par bya ba'i don to //
translated: The reality is the reality that is based on the aspects of the conventional and the ultimate, and the meaning is to be known.

original: de ltar sdom pa'i yul la dri ba'i lan brtson pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar sdom pa'i yul la dri ba'i lan brtson pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the answer to the question about the object of the vow,

original: dngos su sdom pa bshad pa brjod pa de'i yan lag bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig bstan pa ni /üîΩsdom pa srung bar byed pa gang //
analyzed: dngos su sdom pa bshad pa brjod pa de'i yan lag bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig bstan pa ni / sdom pa srung bar byed pa gang //
translated: he teaches the pledge to be guarded, which is a limb of the explanation of the vow itself.üîΩWhat is the vow-observing?

original: zhes bya ba ni sdom pa byed pas na sngom pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sdom pa byed pas na sngom pa'o //
translated: The vow is that which makes the vow.

original: srung bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni phyir mi spro ba'i don gyis so //üîΩde ni byang chub sems zhes brjod //
analyzed: srung bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni phyir mi spro ba'i don gyis so // de ni byang chub sems zhes brjod //
translated: The vow-observing is the meaning of not being scattered.üîΩThat is called the thought of enlightenment.

original: ces bya ba ni kun rdzob ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni kun rdzob ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: That is the conventional.

original: 'o na de la ji ltar bsrung zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na de la ji ltar bsrung zhe na /
translated: Well, how is it to be guarded?

original: de'i phyir rdo rje rtse mor zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje rtse mor zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, in the Vajra Peak:

original: thabs kyi yan lag tu gyur pa la'o //
analyzed: thabs kyi yan lag tu gyur pa la'o //
translated: in the branches of means.

original: 'dzin bzhin pa bya ba ni sngon du bshad ba'i thabs rnam pa gsum gyis mi spro bar ro //
analyzed: 'dzin bzhin pa bya ba ni sngon du bshad ba'i thabs rnam pa gsum gyis mi spro bar ro //

original: de ni bsrung bar zhes bya ba ni phyir mi spro ba'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: de ni bsrung bar zhes bya ba ni phyir mi spro ba'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: That is called ‚Äúprotection,‚Äù which has the nature of not being scattered.

original: yongs su grags zhes bya ba ni brjod pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yongs su grags zhes bya ba ni brjod pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúWell known‚Äù means the meaning of ‚Äúexpressed.‚Äù

original: de ltar bsrung bar bya ba'i nam tshig bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar bsrung bar bya ba'i nam tshig bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the words to be protected,

original: de las bzlog pa'i sdom pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa'i sdom pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the vow that is the opposite of that,

original: de'i yan lag dbang po rnams kyi yul rnams la longs spyod pa spangs pa brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de'i yan lag dbang po rnams kyi yul rnams la longs spyod pa spangs pa brjod pa ni /
translated: the expression of the abandonment of enjoyment of the objects of the senses, which are the branches of that,

original: dbang po rnams ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dbang po rnams ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: is stated in ‚ÄúThe senses‚Äù and so forth.

original: dbang po rnams ni mig la sogs pa rang gi grub pa'i mtha' las grags pas ngag dang / gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' las grags pas ngag dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / gsang ba dang / bshad pa'i gnas kyi ngo bo'i las kyi dbang po rnams la'o //
analyzed: dbang po rnams ni mig la sogs pa rang gi grub pa'i mtha' las grags pas ngag dang / gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' las grags pas ngag dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / gsang ba dang / bshad pa'i gnas kyi ngo bo'i las kyi dbang po rnams la'o //
translated: The faculties are the eye and so forth, which are the faculties of action known from one's own philosophical system, the faculties of speech, the faculties of hand, foot, anus, and penis, and the faculty of the organ of speech.

original: yul rnams la zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: yul rnams la zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams la'o //
translated: The objects are forms and so forth.

original: 'jug cing gang zhes bya ba ni 'dzin @70b pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: 'jug cing gang zhes bya ba ni 'dzin @70b pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The engagement is the nature of apprehending and so forth.

original: gnas pa zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa'i stobs kyis so //
analyzed: gnas pa zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa'i stobs kyis so //
translated: The abiding is by the power of ignorance.

original: de ni zhes bya ba'i don ni dbang po'i rgyu ba 'jug pa la'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba'i don ni dbang po'i rgyu ba 'jug pa la'o //
translated: The that refers to the engagement of the movement of the faculties.

original: yul rnams la mi rgyu ba bya ba nyid kyis sam 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rigs pas yul dang yul can ma grub pa dang / gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: yul rnams la mi rgyu ba bya ba nyid kyis sam 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rigs pas yul dang yul can ma grub pa dang / gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The non-movement is by the very action of not moving toward the objects, or by the reasoning that will be explained, which is the non-establishment of object and subject, and the nature of R≈´pavajrƒÅ and so forth.

original: byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyis yul can dag brjod pas so //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyis yul can dag brjod pas so //
translated: The subjects are expressed by the nature of bodhicitta.

original: sdom pa ni bsdams pas bsrung ba gang yin pa de dam tshig bsrung ba la yang bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: sdom pa ni bsdams pas bsrung ba gang yin pa de dam tshig bsrung ba la yang bshad pa yin no //
translated: The vow is that which is guarded by restraint. That is also explained as guarding the commitment.

original: 'chad bzhin pa'i le'u nyid las zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'chad bzhin pa'i le'u nyid las zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is in the very chapter that is being explained.

original: de ltar dbang po rnams la yul rnams so ;
analyzed: de ltar dbang po rnams la yul rnams so ;
translated: Thus, the objects in regard to the faculties.

original: / rgyu ba yongs su spang ba bstan nas /üîΩdam tshig dang mi ldan pa'i skye bo dang lhan cig tu gnas pa yongs su spang ba bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / rgyu ba yongs su spang ba bstan nas / dam tshig dang mi ldan pa'i skye bo dang lhan cig tu gnas pa yongs su spang ba bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Having taught the avoidance of movement,

original: gdul dka' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gdul dka' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: in order to explain the avoidance of dwelling together with people who do not have the commitment, [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚Äúdifficult to tame,‚Äù and so on.

original: gdul dka' zhes bya ba ni gdul bar dka' ba'am /
analyzed: gdul dka' zhes bya ba ni gdul bar dka' ba'am /
translated: ‚ÄúDifficult to tame‚Äù means difficult to tame.

original: snying rje la sogs pa rnam par spang ba'i sems kyi rgyan rnams kyis so //
analyzed: snying rje la sogs pa rnam par spang ba'i sems kyi rgyan rnams kyis so //
translated: With the ornaments of the mind that are the abandonment of compassion and so on.

original: de bzhin du sems can gzhan rnams dang lhan cig 'dre ba la sogs pa mi bya zhing zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: de bzhin du sems can gzhan rnams dang lhan cig 'dre ba la sogs pa mi bya zhing zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: Similarly, one should not associate with other sentient beings and so on.

original: tshul 'chos zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: tshul 'chos zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúHypocrisy‚Äù means

original: rigs dang spyod pas smad pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: rigs dang spyod pas smad pa rnams kyis so //
translated: with those who are despised by their family and conduct.

original: sgyu can zhes bya ba ni rigs pa dang mi rigs pa'i spyod pa las phyi rol du gyur pa mu stegs pa la sogs pa rnams dang ngo //
analyzed: sgyu can zhes bya ba ni rigs pa dang mi rigs pa'i spyod pa las phyi rol du gyur pa mu stegs pa la sogs pa rnams dang ngo //
translated: The deceivers are the non-Buddhists, such as the Tƒ´rthikas, who are outside the pale of proper and improper conduct.

original: bsam pa rtsub pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'tshe ba la sogs pa byed pa la rtse gcig pa'o //
analyzed: bsam pa rtsub pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'tshe ba la sogs pa byed pa la rtse gcig pa'o //
translated: The vicious are those who are intent on doing harm, etc.

original: g-yo can dang zhes bya ba ni sgra tsam la g-yo ba 'dzin pa rnams so //
analyzed: g-yo can dang zhes bya ba ni sgra tsam la g-yo ba 'dzin pa rnams so //
translated: The deceitful are those who are attached to mere words.

original: dang med ces bya ba ni las dang las kyi 'bras bu yod pa yongs su dor ba'o//
analyzed: dang med ces bya ba ni las dang las kyi 'bras bu yod pa yongs su dor ba'o//
translated: The nihilists are those who reject the existence of karma and its effects.

original: rtog ge zhes bya ba ni rtog ge skam po gcig pu la gnas pa rnams so //
analyzed: rtog ge zhes bya ba ni rtog ge skam po gcig pu la gnas pa rnams so //
translated: The speculators are those who are attached to mere speculation.

original: lhan cig ces bya ba ni lhan cig tu'o //
analyzed: lhan cig ces bya ba ni lhan cig tu'o //
translated: The together is the togetherness.

original: de bzhin rtags kyis nyer 'tsho dang // zhes bya ba ni don dam par lta ba log pa yin yang grub mtha' la 'dris par bya ba'i don du rab tu byung ba 'dzin pa'i sgyu thabs kyis gang dag dam tshig la sogs pa 'dzin par byed pa de rnams ni rtags kyis nye bar 'tsho ba'o
analyzed: de bzhin rtags kyis nyer 'tsho dang // zhes bya ba ni don dam par lta ba log pa yin yang grub mtha' la 'dris par bya ba'i don du rab tu byung ba 'dzin pa'i sgyu thabs kyis gang dag dam tshig la sogs pa 'dzin par byed pa de rnams ni rtags kyis nye bar 'tsho ba'o
translated: Those who live by signs are those who, although their view is ultimately false, are initiated into the philosophical system by means of the skillful means of accepting the vows of ordination, and who then maintain the vows of morality, etc.

original: // nyan thos zhes bya ba ni bdag gcig pu zhi ba dang / dul bar bya ba'i phyir rtse gcig pa'o //
analyzed: // nyan thos zhes bya ba ni bdag gcig pu zhi ba dang / dul bar bya ba'i phyir rtse gcig pa'o //
translated: The Sravakas are those who are one-pointed in order to pacify and tame themselves alone.

original: de bzhin du nor la brkam chags can zhes bya ba ni sems kyi rgyud la ser sna yod pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de bzhin du nor la brkam chags can zhes bya ba ni sems kyi rgyud la ser sna yod pa rnams kyis so //
translated: Similarly, those who are greedy for wealth are those whose mental continuum is stingy.

original: de kho na nyid sun @71a * //üîΩ'byin cing // zhes bya ba ni thabs shes rab tha mi dad pa'i de kho na nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de kho na nyid sun @71a * // 'byin cing // zhes bya ba ni thabs shes rab tha mi dad pa'i de kho na nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: And those who disparage reality.

original: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyi sku gzugs la sogs pa rnams la smod par byed pa rnams so //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyi sku gzugs la sogs pa rnams la smod par byed pa rnams so //
translated: Those who disparage reality are those who disparage the images, etc. which are the embodiment of means and insight, in order to teach the reality which is the non-duality of means and insight.

original: don dam par ni mi shes pa //
analyzed: don dam par ni mi shes pa //
translated: They are ignorant of the ultimate because they do not know the ultimate reality.

original: zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa la mos pa dang bral ba rnams kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa la mos pa dang bral ba rnams kyis so //
translated: This is for those who are devoid of the aspiration that all phenomena are essenceless.

original: med par lta dang zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob pa snang bzhin pa'i dngos po rnams la sdang pa sel ba rnams so //
analyzed: med par lta dang zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob pa snang bzhin pa'i dngos po rnams la sdang pa sel ba rnams so //
translated: The view of nonexistence refers to those who are averse to the appearance of things in the conventional.

original: tshul khrims 'chal zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du dam tshig nyams pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims 'chal zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du dam tshig nyams pa'o //
translated: Immoral refers to those who repeatedly violate their vows.

original: de lta bu la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu gtam ni smra dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de lta bu la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu gtam ni smra dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should not converse with such people, etc.

original: long gtam la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: long gtam la sogs pa'o //
translated: This refers to idle gossip, etc.

original: mi bya zhing zhes bya ba ni sdom pa nyams par thal bas so //
analyzed: mi bya zhing zhes bya ba ni sdom pa nyams par thal bas so //
translated: One should not, because it would lead to the violation of one's vows.

original: 'dre ba la sogs mi bya zhing //
analyzed: 'dre ba la sogs mi bya zhing //
translated: One should not associate with them, etc.

original: zhes bya ba ni snod gcig tu chang la sogs pa longs spyod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snod gcig tu chang la sogs pa longs spyod par mi bya'o //
translated: This means that one should not enjoy beer, etc. in the same vessel.

original: de gcig pur ma zad kyi ji srid du /
analyzed: de gcig pur ma zad kyi ji srid du /
translated: Not only that, but for as long as

original: se gol gtogs pa tsam du yang //
analyzed: se gol gtogs pa tsam du yang //
translated: One should not even snap one's fingers.

original: zhes bya ba ni skad cig tsam du yang ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni skad cig tsam du yang ngo //
translated: This means even for a moment.

original: de dang lhan cig ces bya ba ni de ma thag tu bshad pa'i gdul dka' ba la sogs pa rnams dang lhan cig go //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig ces bya ba ni de ma thag tu bshad pa'i gdul dka' ba la sogs pa rnams dang lhan cig go //
translated: ‚ÄúTogether with them‚Äù means together with those difficult to tame and so forth, just explained.

original: gang du yang zhes bya ba ni yul gang du yang ngo //
analyzed: gang du yang zhes bya ba ni yul gang du yang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúIn any place‚Äù means in any country.

original: gnas mi bya zhes bya ba ni lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gnas mi bya zhes bya ba ni lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should not stay‚Äù means one should not stay together with them.

original: de ltar dam tshig mi ldan pa'i skye bo dang lhan cig tu gnas pa yongs su spang bar brjod nas ;
analyzed: de ltar dam tshig mi ldan pa'i skye bo dang lhan cig tu gnas pa yongs su spang bar brjod nas ;
translated: Having thus described the avoidance of staying together with people who do not have the commitments,

original: 'gal ba'i rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig tu gnas pa yongs su spang ba bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'gal ba'i rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig tu gnas pa yongs su spang ba bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the avoidance of staying together with yoginƒ´s who are in conflict,

original: las kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares the karmamudrƒÅ, and so on.

original: las tsam pa nye bar mkho ba'i phyir ro //üîΩde bzhin gang zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i sems can bzhin du gal te gdul dka' ba la sogs pa'i skyon mang bas de dang lhan cig tu /
analyzed: las tsam pa nye bar mkho ba'i phyir ro // de bzhin gang zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i sems can bzhin du gal te gdul dka' ba la sogs pa'i skyon mang bas de dang lhan cig tu /
translated: Because of the need for just the karma,

original: dam tshig la ni 'jug mi bya //
analyzed: dam tshig la ni 'jug mi bya //
translated: ‚Äúif‚Äù means if, like the sentient beings explained previously, there are many faults of being difficult to tame and so forth, then ‚Äúone should not enter into the commitments together with them.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: This is connected with the above.

original: gal te byis pa so so'i skye bo dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gal te byis pa so so'i skye bo dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If one dwells with a fool,

original: byis pa ni de kho na nyid kyi yul la brda ma byang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byis pa ni de kho na nyid kyi yul la brda ma byang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: a fool is one who is not skilled in the object of reality.

original: so so'i skye bo zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi bya ba la dga' ba nyid kyis 'phags pa'i skye bo dang / lhan cig tu gnas pa bral ba'o //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi bya ba la dga' ba nyid kyis 'phags pa'i skye bo dang / lhan cig tu gnas pa bral ba'o //
translated: A ‚Äúcommon person‚Äù is one who is separated from the noble person by delighting in external activities.

original: de dang lhan cig dam tshig ni /
analyzed: de dang lhan cig dam tshig ni /
translated: The pledge with him is

original: sa cig tu ts'a ru'i bza' ba la sogs pa mi bya ba ste /
analyzed: sa cig tu ts'a ru'i bza' ba la sogs pa mi bya ba ste /
translated: not to do such things as eat the Caru oblation together.

original: bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not to be accomplished.

original: rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis nyams pa'i 'jigs pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis nyams pa'i 'jigs pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúOne‚Äôs yoga will decline‚Äù means that there is the danger of the decline of the two kinds of yoga.

original: de ltar 'gal ba'i rnal 'byor @71b ma dang lhan cig gnas pa spang bar bya ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar 'gal ba'i rnal 'byor @71b ma dang lhan cig gnas pa spang bar bya ba bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the avoidance of dwelling with one whose yoga is contrary,

original: tshul 'chos kyi dam tshig dang ldan pa dang lhan cig gnas pa yongs su spang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: tshul 'chos kyi dam tshig dang ldan pa dang lhan cig gnas pa yongs su spang ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to completely avoid dwelling with one who has the pledge of hypocrisy,

original: gdul dka' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gdul dka' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, ‚Äúdifficult to tame,‚Äù etc.

original: dam tshig dang mi ldan pa dang 'gal ba rnams kyis so //
analyzed: dam tshig dang mi ldan pa dang 'gal ba rnams kyis so //
translated: Those who are not endowed with the commitments and who violate them.

original: dam tshig mthar gnas pa zhes bya ba ni bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig la sogs pa las phyi rol du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig mthar gnas pa zhes bya ba ni bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig la sogs pa las phyi rol du gyur pa'o //
translated: Those who abide in the extremity of the commitments are those who are outside of the commitments that are to be guarded, etc.

original: dam tshig gi mtha' ma ring du gnas pa nyid kyi phyir dam tshig gi mthar gnas pa'o //üîΩsnod dang phyag rgya sogs bstan dang // zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang mi ldan pa la thod pa dang kha tv'am ga la sogs pa ston par byed cing bdag ni rnal 'byor pa ste /
analyzed: dam tshig gi mtha' ma ring du gnas pa nyid kyi phyir dam tshig gi mthar gnas pa'o // snod dang phyag rgya sogs bstan dang // zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang mi ldan pa la thod pa dang kha tv'am ga la sogs pa ston par byed cing bdag ni rnal 'byor pa ste /
translated: They abide in the extremity of the commitments because they abide far away from the commitments.

original: bdag ni mthu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhan rnams 'dun pa bskyed pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: bdag ni mthu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhan rnams 'dun pa bskyed pa'i don du'o //
translated: The display of the vessel, the seal, etc.  means that they display the skull cup, the kha·π≠vƒÅ·πÖga staff, etc. to those who do not have the commitments, and they say, I am a yogin, I am powerful, etc. in order to generate devotion in others.

original: skam dang 'brel pas 'jug pa dang // zhes bya ba ni dam tshig la sogs pa la ste /
analyzed: skam dang 'brel pas 'jug pa dang // zhes bya ba ni dam tshig la sogs pa la ste /
translated: The engagement through connection with the dry is with regard to the commitments, etc.

original: dad pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dad pas ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not through faith.

original: lhan cig ces bya ba ni lhan cig pas so //
analyzed: lhan cig ces bya ba ni lhan cig pas so //
translated: Simultaneously means together.

original: dam tshig la ni 'jug mi bya //
analyzed: dam tshig la ni 'jug mi bya //
translated: One should not engage in the commitments.

original: zhes bya ba ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa lhan cig rjes su bsgrub par mi bya'o //üîΩde ltar rnam pa bzhis bzlog pa'i ngo bo sdom pa bstan nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa lhan cig rjes su bsgrub par mi bya'o // de ltar rnam pa bzhis bzlog pa'i ngo bo sdom pa bstan nas /
translated: One should not practice together with the ga·πáacakra, etc.üîΩThus, having taught the essence of the vow as the opposite of the four,

original: 'jug pa'i ngo bo'i sdom pa bstan pa la 'jug pa'i phyir snod ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'jug pa'i ngo bo'i sdom pa bstan pa la 'jug pa'i phyir snod ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he teaches the essence of the vow as engagement.

original: snod ni thod pa'o //
analyzed: snod ni thod pa'o //
translated: The vessel is the skull.

original: da ma ru zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das dang 'brel pa'i'o //
analyzed: da ma ru zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das dang 'brel pa'i'o //
translated: The damaru is the one related to the BhagavƒÅn.

original: gri gug ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag mtshan no //
analyzed: gri gug ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag mtshan no //
translated: The flaying knife is the hand implement of the Bhagavatƒ´.

original: sngags bam dang zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi glegs bam mo //
analyzed: sngags bam dang zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi glegs bam mo //
translated: The mantra book is the book of mantras.

original: bgrang phreng dang zhes bya ba ni phreng ba'o //
analyzed: bgrang phreng dang zhes bya ba ni phreng ba'o //
translated: The rosary is the garland.

original: dam tshig med pa zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang mi ldan pa'i skye bo spang bar bya'o ;
analyzed: dam tshig med pa zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang mi ldan pa'i skye bo spang bar bya'o ;
translated: One should avoid those who are without the commitments, i.e., those who do not have the commitments.

original: / gzhan dag la zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang mi ldan pa dang dbang ma bskur ba'o //
analyzed: / gzhan dag la zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang mi ldan pa dang dbang ma bskur ba'o //
translated: Others are those who do not have the commitments and are not initiated.

original: gang du yang bstan par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni bstan par mi bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang du yang bstan par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni bstan par mi bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúOne should not teach it to anyone‚Äù means that it should not be taught.

original: dam tshig nyams pas 'jigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dam tshig nyams pas 'jigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: de ltar 'jug pa'i ngo bo'i sdom pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar 'jug pa'i ngo bo'i sdom pa bstan nas /

original: gnyis ka'i ngo bo sdom pa mngon par brjod pa'i yan lag dam tshig la gnas pa'i man ngag brjod par bya ba'i phyir /üîΩdge slong sdom pa la gnas pa //
analyzed: gnyis ka'i ngo bo sdom pa mngon par brjod pa'i yan lag dam tshig la gnas pa'i man ngag brjod par bya ba'i phyir / dge slong sdom pa la gnas pa //
translated: in order to explain the essence of both, the advice for abiding in the commitments, which is a limb of the expression of the vow,

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúThe monk who abides in the vow,üîΩ‚Äù

original: dge slong zhes bya ba ni rtags tsam 'dzin pa'i dge slong ngo //
analyzed: dge slong zhes bya ba ni rtags tsam 'dzin pa'i dge slong ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúMonk‚Äù means a monk who merely holds the signs.

original: rnal 'byor spyod sogs bya ba min //
analyzed: rnal 'byor spyod sogs bya ba min //
translated: ‚ÄúShould not perform the yoga practice, etc.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: is the remainder.

original: de nyid kyi phyir @72a * //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir @72a * //
translated: For that very reason,

original: sdom pa la gnas pa zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: sdom pa la gnas pa zhes gsungs te /
translated: he says, ‚Äúwho abides in the vow.‚Äù

original: rang dang rjes su mthun pa so sor thar pa'i sdom pa la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rang dang rjes su mthun pa so sor thar pa'i sdom pa la gnas pa'o //
translated: He abides in the pratimoksha vow that is suitable for himself.

original: rnal 'byor ni rim pa gnyis sgom pa po rnams kyi spyod pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni rim pa gnyis sgom pa po rnams kyi spyod pa /
translated: ‚ÄúYoga‚Äù is the practice of those who meditate on the two stages.

original: spros bcas la sogs pa gsum mo //
analyzed: spros bcas la sogs pa gsum mo //
translated: It is the three, the elaborate, etc.

original: de dang por gang la yod pa de rnams la de skad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dang por gang la yod pa de rnams la de skad ces bya ba'o //
translated: Those who have it at the beginning are called that.

original: bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po thob par 'os pa rnams so //
analyzed: bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po thob par 'os pa rnams so //
translated: The action is those who are worthy of attaining the Great Seal.

original: man ngag dang ni bstan par mi bya ba ni /
analyzed: man ngag dang ni bstan par mi bya ba ni /

original: brgyud pa'i rim pas brjod pa bstan pa ni sngar bzhin mi bya ba'o //
analyzed: brgyud pa'i rim pas brjod pa bstan pa ni sngar bzhin mi bya ba'o //
