original: ras ris la sogs mi bya zhing //
analyzed: ras ris la sogs mi bya zhing //
translated: The painting and so forth is not to be done.

original: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya chen po'i rnam par bstan par mi bya ste dgos pa med do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya chen po'i rnam par bstan par mi bya ste dgos pa med do //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn is not to be represented in the form of the Great Seal, because there is no need.

original: de ltar dam tshig la mi gnas pa la man ngag mi smra bar bya ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar dam tshig la mi gnas pa la man ngag mi smra bar bya ba bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught that one should not speak the instruction to those who do not abide in the commitments,

original: spyod pa mi brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: spyod pa mi brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to not speak of the conduct,

original: gnyis pa'i yan lag bstan pa ni //
analyzed: gnyis pa'i yan lag bstan pa ni //
translated: the second branch is taught:

original: gang gis spyod dus lhan cig tu //
analyzed: gang gis spyod dus lhan cig tu //
translated: By whom, at the time of conduct, together with

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so forth is stated.

original: tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa byed pa'i dus su gang dang lhan cig tu tshogs kyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i mtshan nyid dang lhan cig tu'o //
analyzed: tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa byed pa'i dus su gang dang lhan cig tu tshogs kyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i mtshan nyid dang lhan cig tu'o //
translated: At the time of performing the ga·πáacakra and so forth, one should be together with the heroes and heroines who dwell in the ga·πáacakra, and with the characteristics of the heroes and heroines.

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gang zhig gi ngag gis so //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gang zhig gi ngag gis so //
translated: How? With what kind of speech.

original: spyod pa zhes bya ba ni ts'a ru'i bza' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: spyod pa zhes bya ba ni ts'a ru'i bza' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: Conduct means the characteristics of the cƒÅru food and so forth.

original: yang dag spyod ces bya ba ni rang nyid kyis bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang dag spyod ces bya ba ni rang nyid kyis bya ba'o //
translated: Correct conduct means doing it oneself.

original: bla ma la yang zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba dang rgyud bshad pa la'o //
analyzed: bla ma la yang zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba dang rgyud bshad pa la'o //
translated: Also to the guru means in the empowerment and explanation of the tantra.

original: de zhes bya ba ni spyod pa spyad pa la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni spyod pa spyad pa la sogs pa la'o //
translated: That means in the conduct of practice and so forth.

original: gzhan rnams la ni smos ci dgos //
analyzed: gzhan rnams la ni smos ci dgos //
translated: What need is there to mention others?

original: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang mi ldan pa la smra ba gtam tsam du brjod par yang mi bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang mi ldan pa la smra ba gtam tsam du brjod par yang mi bya'o //
translated: One should not even speak, that is, utter a mere word, to those who do not have the samaya.

original: de ltar spyod pa mi smra ba nyid bstan pa brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar spyod pa mi smra ba nyid bstan pa brjod nas /
translated: Having thus stated the non-speaking of conduct,üîΩnow, in order to explain the non-speaking of the view, he says:

original: yul rnams la spyod pa'i stobs kyis dbang po'i rgyu ba dgag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yul rnams la spyod pa'i stobs kyis dbang po'i rgyu ba dgag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the prevention of the activity of the sense-faculties by the power of experiencing the objects,

original: dbang po'i yul zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dbang po'i yul zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúThe objects of the sense-faculties,‚Äù and so on.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'o //
translated: The objects of the sense-faculties are forms and so on.

original: dbang po'i spyod pa zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i 'jug pa drug po rnams la'o //
analyzed: dbang po'i spyod pa zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i 'jug pa drug po rnams la'o //
translated: The activity of the sense-faculties is the six engagements of the eye and so on.

original: gang nas zhes bya ba ni thog ma med pa nas kyi ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi stobs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis so //
analyzed: gang nas zhes bya ba ni thog ma med pa nas kyi ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi stobs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis so //
translated: From where? From beginningless time, by the power of the instinct for nescience.

original: de nas bsdams byas nas zhes bya ba ni nges pas so //
analyzed: de nas bsdams byas nas zhes bya ba ni nges pas so //
translated: Then, having restrained, means having ascertained.

original: 'o na ngo bo nyid kyis dbang po rnams yul la mngon par phyogs pa de ji ltar bsdam par bya zhe na /üîΩde'i phyir / stong nyid gnyis med sgyu mas dpyad //
analyzed: 'o na ngo bo nyid kyis dbang po rnams yul la mngon par phyogs pa de ji ltar bsdam par bya zhe na / de'i phyir / stong nyid gnyis med sgyu mas dpyad //
translated: But how can the sense-faculties, which are by nature directed toward the objects, be restrained?

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, he says, ‚ÄúAnalyze emptiness, non-duality, and illusion.‚Äù

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtan tshigs rnams kyis stong pa nyid @72b dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtan tshigs rnams kyis stong pa nyid @72b dpyad par bya ste /
translated: One should analyze emptiness by means of the reason of dependent origination.

original: phyi rol gyi don la phra rags la sogs pa'i brtag pas gnod pa'i phyir dang / yod pa sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir dang / bag chags kyi stobs kyis sems tsam po snang ba nyid ni gnyis su med pa'i dpyad pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don la phra rags la sogs pa'i brtag pas gnod pa'i phyir dang / yod pa sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir dang / bag chags kyi stobs kyis sems tsam po snang ba nyid ni gnyis su med pa'i dpyad pa'o //
translated: because it is undermined by the analysis of external objects into subtle and coarse parts, etc., because there is no valid cognition to establish their existence, and because the mere mind, which appears through the power of habitual tendencies, is analyzed as nondual.

original: dngos po med kyang shing dang bong ba la sogs pa bzhin du glang po che'i snang ba ltar sgyu ma la sogs pa spyad par bya ste /
analyzed: dngos po med kyang shing dang bong ba la sogs pa bzhin du glang po che'i snang ba ltar sgyu ma la sogs pa spyad par bya ste /
translated: Even though things do not exist, one should practice illusion, etc., like the appearance of an elephant, like a tree, a clod of earth, etc.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni dri za'i grong khyer la sogs pa rnams gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni dri za'i grong khyer la sogs pa rnams gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes the city of gandharvas, etc.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i rnam par dpyad pa ni bsdam par bya zhes bya ba dang 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i rnam par dpyad pa ni bsdam par bya zhes bya ba dang 'brel pa'o //
translated: Such an analysis should be ‚Äúrestricted,‚Äù as the text says.

original: kun rdzob ces bya ba ni don dam pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun rdzob ces bya ba ni don dam pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word ‚Äúconventional‚Äù is used because it is in accordance with the ultimate.

original: ji skad du /üîΩde nyid khang bzangs rtse mor ni //
analyzed: ji skad du / de nyid khang bzangs rtse mor ni //
translated: As it is said:

original: 'dzeg par rigs pa ma yin te //
analyzed: 'dzeg par rigs pa ma yin te //
translated: It is not right to climbüîΩto the top of the palace of reality

original: yang dag kun rdzob them skas ni //
analyzed: yang dag kun rdzob them skas ni //
translated: without the ladder of the correct conventional.

original: med par mos pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: med par mos pa rnams la'o //
translated: It is for those who are devoted to nonexistence.üîΩ

original: zhes gsungs so /
analyzed: zhes gsungs so /
translated: For those who are devoted to non-existence.

original: lhag ces bya ba ni shin tu'am yang nas yang du'o //
analyzed: lhag ces bya ba ni shin tu'am yang nas yang du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúExcessively‚Äù means very much or again and again.

original: de ltar yul rnams la rnam par dpyad pa'i stobs kyis dbang po'i rgyu ba rnams 'gag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar yul rnams la rnam par dpyad pa'i stobs kyis dbang po'i rgyu ba rnams 'gag pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the cessation of the movements of the senses by the power of the analysis of the objects,

original: khyad par du 'phags pa'i dngos po la chags pa'i stobs kyis 'dun pa bzlog pa'i phyir /üîΩshes rab ye shes dbang bskur sogs //

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /

analyzed: nyams su myong ba ni dbang po rnams bsdam par bya zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //

analyzed: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni dran pa la mngon du phyogs par byed pas bde ba chen po reg pas rang gi rgyud la skyed par byed pa rnams kyis so //

analyzed: gal te de ltar yin na 'o na sngags bzla bar mi bya'am zhe na /
translated: One should not speak the mantra aloud means that one should not speak it with the essence of articulated syllables.üîΩThe word mantra refers to the essence mantra, the near essence mantra, and the emanation mantra, and so forth.üîΩOne should not move the lips,üîΩOne should not speak the mantra aloud means that one should not speak it with the essence of articulated syllables.üîΩThe word mantra refers to the essence mantra, the near essence mantra, and the emanation mantra, and so forth.üîΩOne should not move the lips,üîΩOne should not speak the mantra aloud means that one should not speak it with the essence of articulated syllables.

analyzed: de'i phyir cung zad mgrin pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: nang du zla ba'i bdag nyid do //

analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin nam zhe na /

analyzed: de'i phyir gsang la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: sba ba ni phyi rol du mi brjod pas so //

analyzed: mtshungs pa med ces bya ba ni mu stegs la sogs pa dang thun mong ma yin pa'o //

analyzed: de ni sdom par bshad ces bya ba ni phyi rol du gsal bar byed pa sdom pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: de ltar rnam pa gnyis kyis rnam pa gzhan gyi 'jug pa'i ngo bo sdom pa bstan nas /

original: snod min nor ni chen po dang // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: snod min nor ni chen po dang // zhes bya ba gsungs te /

analyzed: sngags kyi spyod pa'i snod ma yin pa'o //

analyzed: nor ni chen po dang zhes bya ba ni nor dang 'bru la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: ldan yang zhes bya ba ni yang dag par ldan yang ngo //

original: pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: spang bar bya zhes bya ba ni dor ba nyid du bya ba'o //

analyzed: de'i phyir dngos grub phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /

analyzed: de ltar snod ma yin pa rnam pa thams cad du spang ba la bka' bsgo ba bstan nas /

analyzed: btung ba dang zhes bya ba ni chang gi btung ba la sogs pa la longs spyod pa'o //

translated: Having thus stated the composition of the reply to the question regarding the domain of commitment, in order to directly teach the explanation of that, the teaching of the consumption of the naturally existing five nectars is taught as a branch of that, beginning with the line that which is to be eaten.

analyzed: nyams myong gi bla ma dang 'brel ba la'o //
translated: It is related to the guru of experience.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i lhan cig skyes pa gsal bar byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa la'o //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i lhan cig skyes pa gsal bar byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa la'o //
translated: The supreme is the cause of manifesting the special innate nature.

original: snod ces bya ba ni snod du gyur pa la'o //
analyzed: snod ces bya ba ni snod du gyur pa la'o //
translated: The vessel is the one who is a vessel.

original: brten na bza' ba rab rtogs byed //
analyzed: brten na bza' ba rab rtogs byed //
translated: If one relies on it, one should understand the food.

original: ces bya ba ni de lta bur gyur pa'i sngags kyis bskul nas so //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni de lta bur gyur pa'i sngags kyis bskul nas so //
translated: This means that one should understand the food by the urging of the mantra that is like that.

original: bdud rtsi lnga yi ngo bos 'thung //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga yi ngo bos 'thung //
translated: One should drink with the nature of the five nectars.

original: zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi lnga'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi lnga'i ngo bo'o //
translated: This means that one should drink with the nature of the five nectars.

original: 'thung zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi bdud rtsi'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bcud kyis len to //
analyzed: 'thung zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi bdud rtsi'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bcud kyis len to //
translated: One should drink means that one should drink the elixir that is free from the characteristics of external nectar.

original: de za ba ni zhes bya ba ni dngos su lces ro myang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: de za ba ni zhes bya ba ni dngos su lces ro myang bar bya ba'o //
translated: That eating means that one should taste with one‚Äôs tongue.

original: des zhes bya ba ni padma de la'o //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ni padma de la'o //
translated: By that means by that lotus.

original: rdo rje 'dzin ces bya ba ni don dam dang kun rdzob kyi rdo rje 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin ces bya ba ni don dam dang kun rdzob kyi rdo rje 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Vajra holder means the vajra holder because of holding the ultimate and relative vajras.

original: de ltar padma'i snod la bdud rtsi'i ro myang ba'i dam tshig bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar padma'i snod la bdud rtsi'i ro myang ba'i dam tshig bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the pledge of tasting the nectar in the lotus vessel in that way,üîΩnow, in order to explain the pledge of the secret worship, he says, ‚Äúone should always worship the guru with the five offerings,‚Äù and so on.

original: dam tshig chen po lnga'i nog bo'i dam tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dam tshig chen po lnga'i nog bo'i dam tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the pledge of the five great commitments,

original: glang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: glang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he declares elephant, etc.

original: glang po ltar lus che ba nyid kyi phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: glang po ltar lus che ba nyid kyi phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: Since the body is great like an elephant, it is the essence of Vairochana.

original: rta ni mgyogs par 'gro ba dang 'dra ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rta ni mgyogs par 'gro ba dang 'dra ba'i phyir /
translated: Since the horse is like swift movement,

original: rlung gi khams kyi rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis don yod grub pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis don yod grub pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: it is the essence of Amoghasiddhi, the essence of the purification of the wind element.

original: khyi ni lce ring ba nyid kyi phyir snang ba mtha' yas kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: khyi ni lce ring ba nyid kyi phyir snang ba mtha' yas kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: Since the dog has a long tongue, it is the essence of Amitabha.

original: ba lang zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: ba lang zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo ste /
translated: The cow is the essence of Ratnasambhava,

original: nor nyid du grags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nor nyid du grags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: since it is renowned as wealth.

original: mi zhes bya ba ni skyes pa rnams la rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi sa mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: mi zhes bya ba ni skyes pa rnams la rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi sa mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The man is the essence of Akshobhya, since the males have consciousness.

original: de rnams ni byang chub sems @76a * //üîΩdpa' dang bcas pa'i khrag ces gsungs te /
analyzed: de rnams ni byang chub sems @76a * //üîΩdpa' dang bcas pa'i khrag ces gsungs te /
translated: Those are the blood of the bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub kyi sems ni kun rdzob kyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems ni kun rdzob kyi rnam pa'o //
translated: The thought of awakening is the conventional aspect.

original: dmar dang bcas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje nyi ma dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: dmar dang bcas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje nyi ma dang bcas pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Together with the red‚Äù means together with the vajra sun.

original: bsdus nas zhes bya ba ni 'bad pas thob nas bdud rtsi lnga'i cho gas bsgrub par byas pa'o //
analyzed: bsdus nas zhes bya ba ni 'bad pas thob nas bdud rtsi lnga'i cho gas bsgrub par byas pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Having gathered‚Äù means having attained through effort, one should accomplish it with the rite of the five nectars.

original: bza' ba ni bza' ba'o //
analyzed: bza' ba ni bza' ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Eating‚Äù means eating.

original: de ni bdud rtsi lnga zhes brjod //
analyzed: de ni bdud rtsi lnga zhes brjod //
translated: That is called the five nectars.

original: ces bya ba ni dam tshig chen po lnga'i bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni dam tshig chen po lnga'i bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means the five great commitments of nectar.

original: de ltar na don rnam pa lngas bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar na don rnam pa lngas bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig brjod nas /
translated: Thus, having described the commitment of eating with five aspects,

original: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang nas /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang nas /
translated: following the Yoginƒ´ Tantras,

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ngo bo'i dam tshig brjod par bya ba'i phyir de'i yan lag tu sngags kyi rim pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dam tshig bstan pa /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ngo bo'i dam tshig brjod par bya ba'i phyir de'i yan lag tu sngags kyi rim pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dam tshig bstan pa /
translated: in order to describe the commitment of the nature of the perfection stage, the commitments of the characteristics of the mantra stage, etc., are taught as its branches.

original: rnam rtog dang ni kun rtog gis //
analyzed: rnam rtog dang ni kun rtog gis //
translated: By conceptualization and thorough conceptualization,

original: zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo drug po rnams la sngags dgod pa'i mtshan nyid rnam rtog gis brtags pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo drug po rnams la sngags dgod pa'i mtshan nyid rnam rtog gis brtags pa ste /
translated: This is the characteristic of the arrangement of the mantras on the six cakras, imagined by the conceptual thought.

original: bza' bar bya zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: bza' bar bya zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: It is connected with the phrase ‚Äúone should eat.‚Äù

original: 'dis ni sngags kyi rim pa bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni sngags kyi rim pa bstan to //
translated: This teaches the sequence of the mantras.

original: rgyud kyi rim pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyud kyi rim pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the sequence of the tantra,

original: gang du zhes dogs nas /
analyzed: gang du zhes dogs nas /
translated: it is asked, ‚ÄúWhere?‚Äù

original: de'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi snod ces bya ba gsungs te /üîΩsrub pa dang sgrub pa'i sbyor ba las skyes pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi snod ces bya ba gsungs te / srub pa dang sgrub pa'i sbyor ba las skyes pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúthe vessel of emptiness.‚ÄùüîΩThe vessel of emptiness, which arises from the practice of the union of the churning and the churning-result,

original: las kyi rlung las byung ba stong pa nyid kyi snod ni rgyud kyi rim pa'i mtshan nyid la'o //
analyzed: las kyi rlung las byung ba stong pa nyid kyi snod ni rgyud kyi rim pa'i mtshan nyid la'o //
translated: arises from the karmavƒÅyu, is the characteristic of the sequence of the tantra.

original: gsal ba zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor mngon sum gyi rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor mngon sum gyi rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúClear‚Äù means that it is realized by the direct perception of the yogin.

original: bza' zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa med par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bza' zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa med par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúEat‚Äù means to make it free of obscurations.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus gsum du'o //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus gsum du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAlways‚Äù means in the three times.

original: rdo rje can gyis zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi de kho na nyid mngon du byed pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje can gyis zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi de kho na nyid mngon du byed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe vajri‚Äù means the one who actualizes the reality of emptiness.

original: stong nyid ye shes pha rol 'gro //
analyzed: stong nyid ye shes pha rol 'gro //
translated: The perfection of the wisdom of emptiness.

original: zhes bya ba ni rgyud kyi rim pa bsgom pa'i mthar phyin pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rgyud kyi rim pa bsgom pa'i mthar phyin pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that one has perfected the cultivation of the stage of the continuum.üîΩThe stage of wisdom is stated with ‚Äúthe three joys,‚Äù and so forth.üîΩThe three joys are the characteristics of joy, supreme joy, and the joy of separation.

original: ye shes kyi rim pa ni dga' ba gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ye shes kyi rim pa ni dga' ba gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The word ‚Äúbliss‚Äù is used to distinguish it from conventional bliss.üîΩIt is the one that heals the burning wheels.üîΩFearing that one might wonder about this,üîΩhe says, ‚ÄúThe teaching of the stage of the secretüîΩis for the sake of the vessel of the innate wisdom.‚ÄùüîΩThe vessel of the innate wisdom is the one who is fit for the stage of wisdom.üîΩThe stage of wisdom is taught with the three joys, and so forth.

original: dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang dga' bral gyi mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang dga' bral gyi mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The three joys are the characteristics of joy, supreme joy, and the joy of separation.

original: bde ba zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi bde ba la khyad par byed pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: bde ba zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi bde ba la khyad par byed pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The word ‚Äúbliss‚Äù is used to distinguish it from conventional bliss.

original: bsreg pa'i 'khor lo rnams gso bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bsreg pa'i 'khor lo rnams gso bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is the one that heals the burning wheels.

original: gang la snyam du dogs nas /
analyzed: gang la snyam du dogs nas /
translated: Fearing that one might wonder about this,

original: de'i phyir / gsang ba'i rim pa bstan pa ni //
analyzed: de'i phyir / gsang ba'i rim pa bstan pa ni //
translated: he says, ‚ÄúThe teaching of the stage of the secretüîΩis for the sake of the vessel of the innate wisdom.‚Äù

original: lhan skyes ye shes snod du ni //
analyzed: lhan skyes ye shes snod du ni //
translated: The vessel of the innate wisdom is the one who is fit for the stage of wisdom.üîΩThe stage of wisdom is taught with the three joys, and so forth.üîΩThe three joys are the characteristics of joy, supreme joy, and the joy of separation.üîΩThe word ‚Äúbliss‚Äù is used to distinguish it from conventional bliss.üîΩIt is the one that heals the burning wheels.üîΩFearing that one might wonder about this,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúThe teaching of the stage of the secretüîΩis for the sake of the vessel of the innate wisdom.‚Äù

original: dpe dang don gyi ngo bos sa //
analyzed: dpe dang don gyi ngo bos sa //
translated: The vessel of the innate wisdom is the one who is fit for the stage of wisdom.üîΩThe stage of wisdom is taught with the three joys, and so forth.üîΩThe three joys are the characteristics of joy, supreme joy, and the joy of separation.üîΩThe word ‚Äúbliss‚Äù is used to distinguish it from conventional bliss.

original: bza' ba zhes bya ba ni sngon bzhin no //
analyzed: bza' ba zhes bya ba ni sngon bzhin no //
translated: It is the one that heals the burning wheels.üîΩFearing that one might wonder about this,

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus rtag tu'o //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus rtag tu'o //
translated: he says, ‚ÄúThe teaching of the stage of the secretüîΩis for the sake of the vessel of the innate wisdom.‚Äù

original: rdo rje can zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rtse mor thon pa'i byang @76b chub kyi sems nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩbde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas //
analyzed: rdo rje can zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rtse mor thon pa'i byang @76b chub kyi sems nyid kyi phyir ro // bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas //
translated: The vajra-holder is because of the very bodhicitta that emerges at the tip of the vajra.

original: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gi gnas gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gi gnas gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ba'o //
translated: Abides in the state of great bliss means that which abides in the state of great bliss is so called.

original: don gyi de kho na nyid gcig tu bla ma'i man ngag gis gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don gyi de kho na nyid gcig tu bla ma'i man ngag gis gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the reality of the meaning is unified in the guru's instructions.

original: de ltar rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
translated: Thus, following the yoga tantra,

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ngo bo'i sngags kyi rim pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dam tshig bstan nas /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ngo bo'i sngags kyi rim pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dam tshig bstan nas /
translated: the commitments that are characterized by the mantra stage, and so on, which are the essence of the completion stage, have been explained.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs te /
translated: Following the great yoga tantra,

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ngo bo'i dam tshig rdo rje bzlas pa'i ngo bo dam tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ngo bo'i dam tshig rdo rje bzlas pa'i ngo bo dam tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain the commitments that are the essence of the completion stage, the commitments that are the essence of vajra repetition,

original: rnam rtog rlung rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
analyzed: rnam rtog rlung rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
translated: he says the winds of conceptuality, and so on.

original: rnam rtog ni le'u gsum pa las bshad pa'i brgya rtsa brgyad kyi grangs te /
analyzed: rnam rtog ni le'u gsum pa las bshad pa'i brgya rtsa brgyad kyi grangs te /
translated: The concepts are the eighty-one mentioned in the third chapter.

original: rlung rnams kyang de tsam gyi grangs can te zhes bya ba ni rnam rtog gi rlung ngo //
analyzed: rlung rnams kyang de tsam gyi grangs can te zhes bya ba ni rnam rtog gi rlung ngo //
translated: The winds are also of that number, that is, the winds of concepts.

original: thams cad ces bya ba ni ma lus pa rnams te /
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba ni ma lus pa rnams te /
translated: All means without exception.

original: bza' zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: bza' zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: It is connected with the word ‚Äúeat.‚Äù

original: gang du zhe na /
analyzed: gang du zhe na /
translated: Where?

original: de'i phyir zhi ba'i de nyid ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhi ba'i de nyid ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said ‚Äúin the reality of peace.‚Äù

original: thabs las byung ba'i rdo rje bzlas pa dag gis 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid can la'o //
analyzed: thabs las byung ba'i rdo rje bzlas pa dag gis 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid can la'o //
translated: In the clear light nature by means of the vajra repetition arisen from the method.

original: snod bzang por zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa lhung ba 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: snod bzang por zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa lhung ba 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can gyi phyir ro //
translated: In a good vessel, because it is the nature of the receptacle of the fallen concepts.

original: bza' zhes bya ba ni rlung dang sngags kyi de kho na nyid ngag gis mi snang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: bza' zhes bya ba ni rlung dang sngags kyi de kho na nyid ngag gis mi snang bar bya ba'o //
translated: Eat means to make the reality of the winds and mantras invisible by means of the voice.

original: rlung gi de nyid shes pas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rlung gi de nyid shes pas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: By knowing the reality of the winds,

original: thabs rjes su bsgrub pa'i bdag nyid can gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: thabs rjes su bsgrub pa'i bdag nyid can gyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is the nature of the accomplishment of the method.

original: rnam rtog med pa'i go 'phang gnas //
analyzed: rnam rtog med pa'i go 'phang gnas //
translated: Abides in the state free of discursive thought.

original: zhes bya ba ni ngag rnam par dben pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi kho na nyid la rnam par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ngag rnam par dben pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi kho na nyid la rnam par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that one abides in reality, which is characterized by the isolation of speech.

original: de ltar rdo rje bzlas pa'i dam tshig bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje bzlas pa'i dam tshig bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the commitment of vajra repetition,

original: sems rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo'i dam tshig bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩphyag rgya gsum dang yang dag sbyor //
analyzed: sems rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo'i dam tshig bstan pa'i phyir / phyag rgya gsum dang yang dag sbyor //
translated: in order to teach the commitment of the nature of the purified mind,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚Äúunited with the three mudrƒÅs,‚Äù and so on.

original: las dang chos dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis thob par bya'o //
analyzed: las dang chos dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis thob par bya'o //
translated: One should attain the three mudrƒÅs‚Äîaction, phenomena, and pledge‚Äî

original: yang dag sbyor zhes bya ba ni snang ba la sogs pa'i ye shes gsum gyi bdag nyid can te /
analyzed: yang dag sbyor zhes bya ba ni snang ba la sogs pa'i ye shes gsum gyi bdag nyid can te /
translated: ‚Äúunited‚Äù means having the nature of the three wisdoms, such as appearance, and so on.

original: bza' zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: bza' zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: This is connected with ‚Äúone should eat.‚Äù

original: gang du zhe na /
analyzed: gang du zhe na /
translated: Where?

original: de'i phyir phyag rgya chen po'i snod ces bya ba zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir phyag rgya chen po'i snod ces bya ba zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚Äúin the vessel of the great seal.‚Äù

original: sems 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo phyag rgya chen po'i snod la'o //
analyzed: sems 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo phyag rgya chen po'i snod la'o //
translated: In the vessel of the great seal, which is the nature of the clear light mind.

original: de'i ming can la snod la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i ming can la snod la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The one who has that name is called the vessel.

original: rang bzhin gyi tshogs la lhung ba bsrung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi tshogs la lhung ba bsrung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it protects the natural assembly from falling.

original: bza' bar bya zhes bya ba ni mi snang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: bza' bar bya zhes bya ba ni mi snang bar bya ba'o //
translated: One should eat means to make it invisible.

original: rnal 'byor de nyid shes @77a * //
analyzed: rnal 'byor de nyid shes @77a * //
translated: The yogi who knows reality

original: pas zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi rim pa'i mthar phyin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pas zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi rim pa'i mthar phyin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: means that he has reached the end of the stage of mantra.

original: rnal 'byor ni sngags so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni sngags so //
translated: Yoga is mantra.

original: de kho na nyid la gnas gsum la de sgom pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid la gnas gsum la de sgom pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: Reality is the essence of meditating on those three abodes.

original: de nyid shes zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid shes pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid shes zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid shes pa'o //
translated: Knowing reality means knowing reality.

original: rnam par mi rtog go 'phang gnas //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog go 'phang gnas //
translated: Abides in the state of nonconceptuality.

original: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis tshogs brgya drug po bzlog pa'i bdag nyid can la 'od gsal gyi go 'phang gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis tshogs brgya drug po bzlog pa'i bdag nyid can la 'od gsal gyi go 'phang gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he abides in the state of clear light, which has the nature of reversing the one hundred and sixteen natural assemblies.

original: de ltar sems rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo'i dam tshig brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar sems rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo'i dam tshig brjod nas /
translated: Having thus stated the pledge of the essence of the pure mind,

original: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the essence of self-consecration,üîΩit is said:

original: dngos dang dngos min sogs 'khrul pa'i //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos min sogs 'khrul pa'i //
translated: Confused about entity and nonentity,

original: zhes bya ba ni yod pa dang med pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo rnam par 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid can kun rtog dang ni yongs rtog gi phra ba dang rags pa'i ngo bo ste de'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yod pa dang med pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo rnam par 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid can kun rtog dang ni yongs rtog gi phra ba dang rags pa'i ngo bo ste de'o //
translated: This is the essence of the imagination of what is nonexistent and existent, etc., which has the characteristic of error, and the essence of the gross and subtle imagination of what is nonexistent.

original: ye shes cher 'char snod du bza' //
analyzed: ye shes cher 'char snod du bza' //
translated: It is the vessel for the arising of great intuition.

original: zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: This is connected with the above.

original: ye shes cher 'char zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal gyi rjes la 'od zer lnga las yang dag par byung ba'i 'od zer kha dog lnga'i ye shes chen po'o //
analyzed: ye shes cher 'char zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal gyi rjes la 'od zer lnga las yang dag par byung ba'i 'od zer kha dog lnga'i ye shes chen po'o //
translated: The arising of great intuition is the great intuition of the five lights of intuition arisen from the five lights after clear light.

original: 'char zhes bya ba ni de las yang dag par byung ba'i sgyu ma'i lus so //
analyzed: 'char zhes bya ba ni de las yang dag par byung ba'i sgyu ma'i lus so //
translated: Arising is the illusory body arisen from that.

original: snod du zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa'i spros pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i bdag nyid can gzung ba'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: snod du zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa'i spros pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i bdag nyid can gzung ba'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Vessel means that it is the nature of the object to be grasped, having the nature of the reversal of all the elaborations of error.

original: bza' zhes bya ba ni mi snang bar byas pa'o //
analyzed: bza' zhes bya ba ni mi snang bar byas pa'o //
translated: To eat means to make it invisible.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa yis zhes bya ba ni chad par lta ba'i rnam par rtog pa bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa yis zhes bya ba ni chad par lta ba'i rnam par rtog pa bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: By the non-conceptual, in order to avert the conceptualization of nihilism.

original: de ltar bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i ngo bo bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i ngo bo bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the nature of the self-consecration,

original: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'i ngo bo'i dam tshig bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩrnam rtog dra ba'i sa bon yang //
analyzed: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'i ngo bo'i dam tshig bstan pa'i phyir / rnam rtog dra ba'i sa bon yang //
translated: in order to teach the nature of the stage of manifest enlightenment,üîΩthe commitment,üîΩhe says, ‚Äúthe seed of the net of conceptualization,‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni bag chags su gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshogs kyi sa bon no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bag chags su gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshogs kyi sa bon no //
translated: the seed of the store of the nature that has become habitual.

original: phung po'i bud zhing snod bzang por //
analyzed: phung po'i bud zhing snod bzang por //
translated: In the fuel of the aggregates, in the good vessel,

original: zhes bya ba ni bza' zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bza' zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: ‚Äúin the fuel‚Äù is to be connected with ‚Äúburn.‚Äù

original: phung po ni sgyu ma lta bu'i lha'i rnam pa dang 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: phung po ni sgyu ma lta bu'i lha'i rnam pa dang 'brel pa'o //
translated: The aggregates are connected with the form of the illusion-like deity.

original: de nyid ni bud shing ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni bud shing ste /
translated: That itself is the fuel,

original: 'od gsal ba'i ye shes kyi mes 'bar bar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba'i ye shes kyi mes 'bar bar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is the burning of the fire of the clear-light intuition.

original: de nyid ni snod bzang po ste der ro //
analyzed: de nyid ni snod bzang po ste der ro //
translated: That itself is the good vessel.üîΩBy the realization of the reality of mantra,

original: sngags kyi de nyid rtogs pas zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas so //
analyzed: sngags kyi de nyid rtogs pas zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas so //
translated: by the yogin.

original: bza' zhes bya ba ni bza' bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: bza' zhes bya ba ni bza' bar bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEat‚Äù means that which is to be eaten.

original: ci zhig byas nas she na /üîΩde'i phyir / ye shes chen po'i me yis smin //
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas she na / de'i phyir / ye shes chen po'i me yis smin //
translated: What is done?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúripened by the fire of great wisdom.‚Äù

original: ting nge 'dzin dang phyag rgya'i rim pa dag gis yang dag par skyes pa'i ye shes chen po ni stong pa la sogs pa gsum pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin dang phyag rgya'i rim pa dag gis yang dag par skyes pa'i ye shes chen po ni stong pa la sogs pa gsum pa'o //
translated: The great wisdom that is properly generated by the stages of samƒÅdhi and mudrƒÅ is the third, emptiness, and so on.

original: de nyid ni me ste rnam @77b par rtog pa thams cad thal ba nyid du byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid ni me ste rnam @77b par rtog pa thams cad thal ba nyid du byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That itself is fire, because it reduces all conceptuality to ashes.

original: de yis smin zhes bya ba ni yongs su smin par byas pas so //
analyzed: de yis smin zhes bya ba ni yongs su smin par byas pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy that‚Äù means by the ripening that is done.

original: de ltar mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'i ngo bo dam tshig bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'i ngo bo dam tshig bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the sacred pledge that is the nature of the stage of manifest enlightenment,

original: zung du 'jug pa'i ngo bo dam tshig bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: zung du 'jug pa'i ngo bo dam tshig bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the sacred pledge that is the nature of union,

original: bdud bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bdud bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, ‚Äúthe four devils,‚Äù and so on.

original: bdud bzhi ni /
analyzed: bdud bzhi ni /
translated: The four devils are

original: phung po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / 'chi bdag dang / lha'i bu'i bdud rnams so //
analyzed: phung po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / 'chi bdag dang / lha'i bu'i bdud rnams so //
translated: the devils of the aggregates, afflictions, lord of death, and the son of the gods.

original: khro bo chen po ni bzlog par bya ba'i thabs kyi zhe sdang ngo //
analyzed: khro bo chen po ni bzlog par bya ba'i thabs kyi zhe sdang ngo //
translated: The great wrath is the anger of the means of averting.

original: de'i stobs ni bdud la sogs pa rnams dang 'brel pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i stobs ni bdud la sogs pa rnams dang 'brel pa nyid do //
translated: Its power is the connection with the demons, etc.

original: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni zung du 'jug pa'i mthar phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni zung du 'jug pa'i mthar phyin pa'o //
translated: The yoga is the perfection of the union.

original: bza' zhes bya ba ni mi snang bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: bza' zhes bya ba ni mi snang bar byed pa'o //
translated: The eating is the invisibility.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: de'i phyir rigs pas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rigs pas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, by reason.

original: tha dad par bsgrub pa bzlog pa'i bdag nyid can gyis so //
analyzed: tha dad par bsgrub pa bzlog pa'i bdag nyid can gyis so //
translated: By the nature of the refutation of the establishment of difference.

original: sgrub pa pos legs par zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgrub pa pos legs par zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The adept is the meaning of well.

original: rab tu mi gnas pa'i go 'phang la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab tu mi gnas pa'i go 'phang la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the abiding in the state of non-abiding.

original: gang du bza' bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: gang du bza' bar bya zhe na /
translated: Where is the eating?

original: de'i phyir snod du zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir snod du zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, in the vessel.

original: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi snod du'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi snod du'o //
translated: In the vessel of nondual intuition.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus gsum du'o //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus gsum du'o //
translated: Always is in the three times.

original: legs par mnyam gzhag nas zhes bya ba ni chad pa'i phyogs su lhung ba med pa'i phyir mi g-yeng ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: legs par mnyam gzhag nas zhes bya ba ni chad pa'i phyogs su lhung ba med pa'i phyir mi g-yeng ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase having properly entered into equipoise means that one is not distracted, because one has not fallen into the extreme of nihilism.

original: de ltar don rnam pa lngas rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa lngas rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
translated: Thus, following the Yoga Tantras in five topics,

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ngo bo'i dam tshig bstan nas /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ngo bo'i dam tshig bstan nas /
translated: the commitments of the stage of completion have been explained.

original: da ni gnyis ka'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
analyzed: da ni gnyis ka'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
translated: Now, following the Unexcelled Tantras,

original: gnyis ka'i dam tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gnyis ka'i dam tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: the commitments of both are taught.

original: de'i yan lag tu sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i yan lag tu sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig bstan pa ni /
translated: The commitments of mantra are taught as a branch of those,üîΩwith the lines beginning,

original: rlung dang sngags dang rdzas rnams kyis //
analyzed: rlung dang sngags dang rdzas rnams kyis //
translated: By the winds, the mantras, and the substances,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /üîΩrim pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /üîΩrim pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
translated: and so forth.

original: kun rdzob dang snying ga dang gsang ba'i sna rtse gsum du rlung dang / sngags dang rdzas rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni 'od zer dang / sngags dang rdzas kyi thig le'i mtshan nyid kyi thig le gsum /
analyzed: kun rdzob dang snying ga dang gsang ba'i sna rtse gsum du rlung dang / sngags dang rdzas rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni 'od zer dang / sngags dang rdzas kyi thig le'i mtshan nyid kyi thig le gsum /
translated: The three vital essences of light rays, mantra, and substance are the three vital essences of the characteristics of the vital essences of light rays, mantra, and substance.

original: mi shigs go 'phang snod du bza' bar bya //
analyzed: mi shigs go 'phang snod du bza' bar bya //
translated: One should eat the state of indestructibility in the vessel.

original: zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: This is connected with the above.

original: mi shigs pa'i go 'phang ni aa yig gi rnam pa la'o //
analyzed: mi shigs pa'i go 'phang ni aa yig gi rnam pa la'o //
translated: The state of indestructibility is the form of the letter A.

original: snod du ni zhes bya ba ni snod nyid du'o //
analyzed: snod du ni zhes bya ba ni snod nyid du'o //
translated: In the vessel means in the vessel itself.

original: bza' zhes bya ba ni bza' bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: bza' zhes bya ba ni bza' bar bya ba'o //
translated: Eat means that which is to be eaten.

original: des rnam par rtog pa mi snang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: des rnam par rtog pa mi snang bar bya ba'o //
translated: By that, conceptualization does not appear.

original: bla na med ces bya ba ni bla na med pa rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bla na med ces bya ba ni bla na med pa rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Unsurpassed means that it is the cause of the unsurpassed vajra repetition.

original: rnal 'byor pha rol 'gro zhes bya ba ni rlung dang sngags dang de kho na nyid kyi @78a * //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pha rol 'gro zhes bya ba ni rlung dang sngags dang de kho na nyid kyi @78a * //
translated: The yogi who has gone to the other shore means that one has gone to the end of the vital winds, mantra, and reality.

original: mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of ‚Äúperfected.‚Äù

original: de ltar sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the pledge of the reality of mantra,

original: snying rje dang shes rab kyi dam tshig brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: snying rje dang shes rab kyi dam tshig brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to express the pledge of compassion and wisdom,

original: stong nyid ye shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: stong nyid ye shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚ÄúThe intuition of voidness,‚Äù and so forth.

original: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes ni 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes ni 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The intuition of voidness is the aspect of clear light.

original: snying rje'i snod kyis zhes bya ba ni /üîΩrtag tu btung ba 'thung bar bya //
analyzed: snying rje'i snod kyis zhes bya ba ni / rtag tu btung ba 'thung bar bya //
translated: The ‚Äúvessel of compassion‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: is connected with the line, ‚Äúalways drink the drink.‚Äù

original: stong pa nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa lhung bar bsrung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa lhung bar bsrung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is in order to protect the fall of the conceptualization of voidness.

original: rtag tu btung ba zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid las langs pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: rtag tu btung ba zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid las langs pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The ‚Äúdrink‚Äù is the aspect of rising from voidness.

original: ye shes chen po mnyam gzhag nas //
analyzed: ye shes chen po mnyam gzhag nas //
translated: Having settled in the great intuition,

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par mi g-yeng ba'i sems zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par mi g-yeng ba'i sems zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: that the mind is undistracted by the samƒÅdhi of the illusion-like.

original: de ltar snying rje dang shes rab kyi dam tshig bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar snying rje dang shes rab kyi dam tshig bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the pledge of compassion and wisdom,üîΩnow, in order to teach the pledge of skillful means and discriminatüîΩive awareness, [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚ÄúThe hero‚Äôs conduct,‚Äù and so forth.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i dam tshig gi ngo bo brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i dam tshig gi ngo bo brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to express the essence of the innate pledge,

original: phyag rgya'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: phyag rgya'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he declares, ‚ÄúThe pledge seal, etc. ‚Äù

original: phyi rol gyi ji lta bu'i ming can zhe na /üîΩde'i phyir dam tshig ces su bshad //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi ji lta bu'i ming can zhe na / de'i phyir dam tshig ces su bshad //
translated: What is the external one like?

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore he declares, ‚ÄúIt is explained as the pledge. ‚Äù

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya ba la'o //üîΩrdo rje padma yang dag sbyor //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya ba la'o // rdo rje padma yang dag sbyor //
translated: In the ‚Äúpledge seal‚Äù it is so called.

original: zhes bya ba ni dbang po gnyis kun nas sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid can la'o //üîΩgang zhig de nyid mchog skyes pa //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dbang po gnyis kun nas sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid can la'o // gang zhig de nyid mchog skyes pa //
translated: ‚ÄúThe union of the vajra and lotus‚Äù is the characteristic of the union of the two organs.

original: zhes bya ba ni dpe dang don gyi rnam pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dpe dang don gyi rnam pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúThat which is born of the supreme reality‚Äù is by way of the example and the meaning.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya de la'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya de la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to that seal.

original: phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe great seal‚Äù is the essence of the enlightenment spirit.

original: skal ldan snod la zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi de kho na nyid kyi snod do //
analyzed: skal ldan snod la zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi de kho na nyid kyi snod do //
translated: ‚ÄúThe fortunate vessel‚Äù is the vessel of the reality of emptiness.

original: 'thung zhes bya ba ni longs spyad par byas nas so //
analyzed: 'thung zhes bya ba ni longs spyad par byas nas so //
translated: ‚ÄúDrink‚Äù means having enjoyed it.

original: nyams dga' ba zhes bya ba ni rol pa'i rim pas myong ba'o //
analyzed: nyams dga' ba zhes bya ba ni rol pa'i rim pas myong ba'o //
translated: The delight is the experience through the stages of play.

original: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa sgom pa po rnams kyis so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa sgom pa po rnams kyis so //
translated: The yoga is the meditators of the connate.

original: bsgrub bya ba de nyid mchog ces bya ba ni don dam pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya ba de nyid mchog ces bya ba ni don dam pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: That very accomplishment is supreme, which is the ultimate nature of the connate.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni rtag tu de nyid kyi ngo bas gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni rtag tu de nyid kyi ngo bas gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is suchness because it always abides as just that nature.

original: lhan cig skyes zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang rkyen las ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang rkyen las ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is connate because it is not produced from causes and conditions.

original: nyon mongs dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is free from afflictions because it conquers the discordant side.

original: phyag rgya chen po don bsgrub pa //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po don bsgrub pa //
translated: The accomplishment of the meaning of mahƒÅmudrƒÅ

original: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ma lus pa thams cad skyed par byed pa ni mchog tu dga' ba sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ma lus pa thams cad skyed par byed pa ni mchog tu dga' ba sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: is the supreme joy, which is the cause of all the qualities of a buddha.

original: de ltar gnyis ka'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
analyzed: de ltar gnyis ka'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
translated: Thus, following the tantra of both,

original: gnyis ka'i dam tshig brjod nas /
analyzed: gnyis ka'i dam tshig brjod nas /
translated: Having described the commitments of both,

original: de'i nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa ni /
translated: he teaches their summary:

original: de lta bu la sogs pa zhes @78b bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de lta bu la sogs pa zhes @78b bya ba gsungs te /
translated: ‚ÄúSuch and so forth‚Äù and so on.

original: sngon du bstan pa'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: sngon du bstan pa'i dam tshig go //
translated: The commitments are as previously taught.

original: gsungs zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSaid‚Äù means expressed.

original: gzhan du gang yang ngas ma bshad //
analyzed: gzhan du gang yang ngas ma bshad //
translated: ‚ÄúI have not taught anything else‚Äù

original: ces bya ba ni ston pa por gyur pa rdo rje 'chang bdag gis so //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni ston pa por gyur pa rdo rje 'chang bdag gis so //
translated: means that I, Vajradhara, the teacher, have not taught anything else.

original: gang yang zhes bya ba ni bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: gang yang zhes bya ba ni bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: ‚ÄúAnything‚Äù means Action Tantras and so on.

original: ma bshad ces bya ba ni sems can rnams snod dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma bshad ces bya ba ni sems can rnams snod dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúHave not taught‚Äù means that sentient beings are not fit vessels.

original: bla ma'i zhal nas zhes bya ba ni brgyud pa'i rim pa ma nyams pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa bla ma'i zhal las so //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal nas zhes bya ba ni brgyud pa'i rim pa ma nyams pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa bla ma'i zhal las so //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom the guru‚Äôs mouth‚Äù means from the mouth of a qualified guru in an unbroken lineage.

original: gsal bar zhes bya ba ni the tshom med par ro //
analyzed: gsal bar zhes bya ba ni the tshom med par ro //
translated: ‚ÄúClearly‚Äù means without doubt.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' go 'phang zhes bya ba ni de thob pa'i rgyu nyid du gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' go 'phang zhes bya ba ni de thob pa'i rgyu nyid du gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThe state of Vajrasattva‚Äù means that it is the cause for attaining that.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni bla na med pa'o //
translated: Supreme means unsurpassed.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
translated: The commentary on the glorious Vajra Garland great yoga tantra

original: pandi ta aa langka la shas mdzad pa zab mo'i don gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las le'u bcu pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
analyzed: pandi ta aa langka la shas mdzad pa zab mo'i don gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las le'u bcu pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
translated: composed by the pa·πá·∏çita Ala·πÖkara≈õƒ´la, called Clarifying the Profound Meaning, is the commentary on the tenth chapter.

original: // / le'ur bcu pas dam tshig gi yul la dri ba'i lan bstan pa brjod nas /
analyzed: // / le'ur bcu pas dam tshig gi yul la dri ba'i lan bstan pa brjod nas /
translated: Having explained the reply to the questions about the domain of the pledges in the tenth chapter,

original: da ni sgra'i yul la dri ba'i lan bstan pa bshad pa'i phyir le'u bcu gcig pa bstan zhing de'i yan lag sgra'i yul la dri ba'i lan rtsom pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni sgra'i yul la dri ba'i lan bstan pa bshad pa'i phyir le'u bcu gcig pa bstan zhing de'i yan lag sgra'i yul la dri ba'i lan rtsom pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain the reply to the questions about the domain of sound, the eleventh chapter is presented, and in order to explain the composition of the reply to the questions about the domain of sound,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: the words then and so forth are stated.

original: le'u bcu pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: le'u bcu pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: After the tenth chapter.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni sngar la ltos pas so //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni sngar la ltos pas so //
translated: The words also and again are used in relation to what precedes.

original: sgra tsam don ni brjod par bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: sgra tsam don ni brjod par bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: Sound alone is related to the object to be expressed.

original: sgra ni h'um yig gi rnam pa ste /
analyzed: sgra ni h'um yig gi rnam pa ste /
translated: Sound is the form of the syllable h≈´·πÉ.

original: de nyid gcig pu ni sgra tsam ste /
analyzed: de nyid gcig pu ni sgra tsam ste /
translated: That alone is sound.

original: de'i don 'dir gtan la 'bebs pa ni brjod par bya ba'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: de'i don 'dir gtan la 'bebs pa ni brjod par bya ba'i nges pa'o //
translated: The ascertainment of the meaning of that is the ascertainment of the object of expression.

original: des ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: des ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: What does it do?

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúby which‚Ä¶‚Äù and so forth.

original: gang gis zhes bya ba ni sgra tsam gyis so //
analyzed: gang gis zhes bya ba ni sgra tsam gyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy which‚Äù is merely by the sound.

original: thos pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis goms pa tsam gyis so //
analyzed: thos pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis goms pa tsam gyis so //
translated: It is merely by the process of hearing and so forth.

original: 'pho ba med pa'i go 'phang thob //
analyzed: 'pho ba med pa'i go 'phang thob //
translated: ‚ÄúThe state of non-transmigration is attained.‚Äù

original: ces bya ba ni skyes pa dang 'chi ba'i rgyun las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir 'pho ba med pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni skyes pa dang 'chi ba'i rgyun las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir 'pho ba med pa'o //
translated: It is non-transmigration because it is beyond the continuum of birth and death.

original: go 'phang zhes bya ba ni rab tu gnas pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: go 'phang zhes bya ba ni rab tu gnas pa'i gnas so //
translated: ‚ÄúState‚Äù is a place of stability.

original: sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi thabs kyis zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi thabs kyis zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy the method of mantra reality‚Äù is the remainder.

original: de ltar sgra'i yul la dri ba'i lan rtsom pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar sgra'i yul la dri ba'i lan rtsom pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the composition of the reply to the object of the sound,üîΩthe composition of the actual expression of that is begun.

original: dngos su de brjod par rtsom pa ni de'i yan lag tu ngo bo bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dngos su de brjod par rtsom pa ni de'i yan lag tu ngo bo bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching of the essence as a branch of that is:

original: chos kyi 'khor lo pad sbubs nas //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo pad sbubs nas //
translated: From the lotus whorl of the wheel of Dharma

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said.

original: chos kyi @79a * //
analyzed: chos kyi @79a * //
translated: The Dharma

original: 'khor lo ni snying ga'i gnas na gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo ni snying ga'i gnas na gnas pa'o //
translated: The wheel is located in the heart center.

original: de'i chu skyes ni padma ste /
analyzed: de'i chu skyes ni padma ste /
translated: Its lotus is a lotus,

original: de'i rnam pa rtsa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa rtsa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it has the nature of eight petals.

original: de'i sbubs zhes bya ba ni lte ba la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i sbubs zhes bya ba ni lte ba la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Its whorl means its center.

original: yang dag gnas pa ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i rtsa'i dbyibs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis so //
analyzed: yang dag gnas pa ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i rtsa'i dbyibs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis so //
translated: Correct placement is by the nature of the shape of the channels that are naturally present.

original: sgra tsam zhes bya ba ni aa ta zhes bya ba ni bza' ba la'o //
analyzed: sgra tsam zhes bya ba ni aa ta zhes bya ba ni bza' ba la'o //
translated: The mere sound means the mere sound of nada.

original: na ni bgegs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: na ni bgegs par byed pa'o //
translated: Na means to obstruct.

original: bza' ba ma yin pa ni n'a da ste /
analyzed: bza' ba ma yin pa ni n'a da ste /
translated: Not to be eaten is non-nada.

original: de nyid gcig tu ni n'a da tsam mo //
analyzed: de nyid gcig tu ni n'a da tsam mo //
translated: That itself is merely nada.

original: rdul phra rab tsam gyi tshad las kyang phra ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'i 'od kyi phreng ba byed pa'i mkhan po'o //
analyzed: rdul phra rab tsam gyi tshad las kyang phra ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'i 'od kyi phreng ba byed pa'i mkhan po'o //
translated: The creator of the garland of light rays of joy is the one who is more subtle than the measure of an atom.

original: yang na sgra tsam ni mchog dga'o //
analyzed: yang na sgra tsam ni mchog dga'o //
translated: Or else, the mere sound is supreme joy.

original: mchog ni mchog ste /
analyzed: mchog ni mchog ste /
translated: Supreme is the best.

original: snang ba mched pa ltar snang ba gang la yod pa de rnams la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: snang ba mched pa ltar snang ba gang la yod pa de rnams la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Those who have it are called those who have the appearance of the increase of appearance.

original: gzhan dag ni chos kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba la gnas pa ham yig sgra tsam po cha shas su bsdus nas tig le'i mthar thug pa zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni chos kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba la gnas pa ham yig sgra tsam po cha shas su bsdus nas tig le'i mthar thug pa zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say that the ultimate drop is the mere sound of the letter ham, which is located in the center of the wheel of phenomena, and is included within the part of the mere sound.

original: ji lta bu zhen /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhen /
translated: What is it like?

original: de'i phyir cha med ces bya ba gsungs te ;
analyzed: de'i phyir cha med ces bya ba gsungs te ;
translated: Therefore, it is said to be partless,

original: thig le'i ngo bo la sems 'dzin pa'i dus ni cha thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thig le'i ngo bo la sems 'dzin pa'i dus ni cha thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because at the time of holding the mind to the nature of the drop, it is free from all parts.

original: snang ba med ba zhes bya ba ni thig le la sems 'dzin pas de bstan pa'i dus su phyi rol gyi snang ba nub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba med ba zhes bya ba ni thig le la sems 'dzin pas de bstan pa'i dus su phyi rol gyi snang ba nub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is said to be non-apparent, because at the time of demonstrating the drop by holding the mind to it, external appearances subside.

original: gnyis su med cing zhes bya ba ni gnyis kyi ngo bo med pa'i phyir de yang bsgom bya dang / sgom byed kyi rnam par rtog pa log pas so //
analyzed: gnyis su med cing zhes bya ba ni gnyis kyi ngo bo med pa'i phyir de yang bsgom bya dang / sgom byed kyi rnam par rtog pa log pas so //
translated: It is said to be non-dual, because it is free from the nature of duality, and that is due to the cessation of the concepts of the object of meditation and the meditator.

original: dri ma med pa zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad zil gyis mnan pas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa la sogs pa spangs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dri ma med pa zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad zil gyis mnan pas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa la sogs pa spangs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is said to be stainless, because it is free from the obscurations of afflictions and so forth, due to the suppression of all opposing factors.

original: bya ba bral zhes bya ba ni byed pa po med pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba bral zhes bya ba ni byed pa po med pa'o //
translated: The statement ‚Äúfree from action‚Äù means that there is no agent.

original: dpe las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni shin tu mtshon par dka' ba nyid kyi phyir dang // de dang 'dra ba gzhan med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni shin tu mtshon par dka' ba nyid kyi phyir dang // de dang 'dra ba gzhan med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The statement ‚Äúbeyond example‚Äù means that it is difficult to illustrate and that there is nothing else like it.

original: gzhi med ces bya ba ni gzhi ni bye brag ste /
analyzed: gzhi med ces bya ba ni gzhi ni bye brag ste /
translated: The statement ‚Äúwithout basis‚Äù means that it is without a basis, that is, without a distinction.

original: skye ba dang / rga ba dang gnas pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba dang / rga ba dang gnas pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: A basis is a distinction, such as arising, enduring, and ceasing.

original: de med pa ni gzhi med pa'o //
analyzed: de med pa ni gzhi med pa'o //
translated: The absence of that is ‚Äúwithout basis.‚Äù

original: rten med pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa nyid kyis rten med pa'o //
analyzed: rten med pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa nyid kyis rten med pa'o //
translated: The statement ‚Äúwithout support‚Äù means that it is without support because it is formless.

original: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pas thob par bya ba'i lha'i rnam pa khyad par du 'phags pa nyid do //
analyzed: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pas thob par bya ba'i lha'i rnam pa khyad par du 'phags pa nyid do //
translated: The statement ‚Äúsupreme‚Äù means that it is superior to the divine form that is attained through the stage of generation.

original: ye shes dbang phyug ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes skyed par byed pa la bdag po nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ye shes dbang phyug ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes skyed par byed pa la bdag po nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The statement ‚Äúlord of wisdom‚Äù means that it is the lord of the wisdom of emptiness because it generates it.

original: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The statement ‚Äúpeace‚Äù means that it is peace because it is the nature of the pacification of all conceptualization.

original: srog dang rtsol ba la sogs @79b spangs //üîΩzhes bya ba ni de'i bdag po nyid kyi phyir srol la sogs pa'i rlung rgyu ba 'jug pa nyid kyis ldog pa med pa'o //
analyzed: srog dang rtsol ba la sogs @79b spangs // zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag po nyid kyi phyir srol la sogs pa'i rlung rgyu ba 'jug pa nyid kyis ldog pa med pa'o //
translated: The life-force and exertion, etc., are abandoned.üîΩThis is because they are its lord, and the life-force, etc., winds move in the forward direction, and do not reverse.

original: rnal 'byor rnams kyang zhes bya ba ni rim pa gnyis bsgom pa la gnas pa rnams so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnams kyang zhes bya ba ni rim pa gnyis bsgom pa la gnas pa rnams so //
translated: The yogis and yoginis who are intent on the yoga of the two stages,üîΩeven they do not find it, let alone the great lords of the gods.

original: lha dbang phyug ces bya ba ni lha ni lha'o //
analyzed: lha dbang phyug ces bya ba ni lha ni lha'o //
translated: The gods are the gods.

original: de rnams la 'di dbang phyug tu gyur pa ni 'phrog byed la sogs pa'o //üîΩkyang zhes bya ba ni mthu chen po dang ldan pa rnams la yang de lta bu ni rnyed pa dka' ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams la 'di dbang phyug tu gyur pa ni 'phrog byed la sogs pa'o // kyang zhes bya ba ni mthu chen po dang ldan pa rnams la yang de lta bu ni rnyed pa dka' ba ste /
translated: The great lords of the gods are the gods who are the lords of the gods, such as Indra.üîΩEven they do not find it, let alone the great lords of the gods.

original: rang gi sems kyi chos nyid kyang des ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi sems kyi chos nyid kyang des ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even those who have great power do not find it, because they do not understand the nature of their own minds.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: In the same way,

original: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa rnams kyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir mchog gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa rnams kyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir mchog gi ngo bo'o //
translated: it is supreme, because it is not the object of worldly people.

original: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas rtogs par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas rtogs par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúPeace‚Äù is so called because it is to be realized by the yogi who is established in the supramundane path.

original: bde ba che zhes bya ba ni sems dang yang dag par ldan pa'i thog ma med pa'i dus can gyi rnam par rtog pa zlog pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrnam pa thams cad rnam spangs pa //
analyzed: bde ba che zhes bya ba ni sems dang yang dag par ldan pa'i thog ma med pa'i dus can gyi rnam par rtog pa zlog pa'i phyir ro // rnam pa thams cad rnam spangs pa //
translated: ‚ÄúGreat bliss‚Äù is so called because it is the reversal of conceptual thought, which is associated with the mind since beginningless time.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngon po dang ser por snang ba la sogs pa thams cad mi snang zhing nub pa'i phyir ro //üîΩthams cad kyi ni khongs su gtogs //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngon po dang ser por snang ba la sogs pa thams cad mi snang zhing nub pa'i phyir ro // thams cad kyi ni khongs su gtogs //
translated: ‚ÄúThe abandonment of all aspects‚Äù is so called because all appearances of blue, yellow, etc., are absent and have disappeared.

original: zhes bya ba ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa rnams la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAll‚Äù refers to the aggregates, elements, sense-fields, etc.

original: khongs su gtogs pa ni khyab par gyur pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: khongs su gtogs pa ni khyab par gyur pa rnams kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúIncluded‚Äù means pervaded by the reversal of conceptual thought.

original: gyur pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gyur pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag par gyur pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTransformation‚Äù means the true transformation.

original: rnam pa kun la zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis yang dag par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa kun la zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis yang dag par gnas pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn every respect‚Äù means in the true nature of all things.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: de'i phyir rten cing 'brel 'byung zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rten cing 'brel 'byung zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúdependent origination.‚Äù

original: 'di la rten pa tsam gyis bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la rten pa tsam gyis bsdus pa'o //
translated: Here, it is included in mere dependence.

original: des brten pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des brten pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is dependent on that,

original: chang dang chang gi ro bzhin no //
analyzed: chang dang chang gi ro bzhin no //
translated: like beer and the taste of beer.üîΩJust as the taste of beer arises from grapes, etc., it abides pervasively.

original: zhes gsungs te ji ltar chang gi ro rgun 'brum la sogs pa las byung ba la khyab par gnas pa de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes gsungs te ji ltar chang gi ro rgun 'brum la sogs pa las byung ba la khyab par gnas pa de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: That is the meaning.

original: de ltar na 'di tsam gyis rang gi ngo bo bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar na 'di tsam gyis rang gi ngo bo bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the nature of that [path] with just that [verse],

original: de'i thabs brjod pa'i phyir /üîΩrang gi nyams myong rtogs pa'i gnas //
analyzed: de'i thabs brjod pa'i phyir / rang gi nyams myong rtogs pa'i gnas //
translated: in order to express the method of that [path],

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: it is said, ‚Äúthe place of realization of one‚Äôs own experience.‚Äù

original: rang gi bdag nyid kyi'o //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid kyi'o //
translated: One‚Äôs own is one‚Äôs own nature.

original: nyams myong ni thabs la goms pa'i mtshan nyid de las rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni rang gis rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: nyams myong ni thabs la goms pa'i mtshan nyid de las rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni rang gis rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Experience is the characteristic of the method of practice. Realization is the realization of one‚Äôs own [nature].

original: gang gis she na /üîΩde'i phyir / sngags kyi de nyid mchog sbyor ba //
analyzed: gang gis she na / de'i phyir / sngags kyi de nyid mchog sbyor ba //
translated: By what?

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúthe supreme application of the reality of mantra.‚Äù

original: 'chad bzhin pa'i rigs pas lte ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i ai'i yi ge kha sbyor thig le'i sgras brjod par bya ba'i sngags kyi de kho na nyid la sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas rig par bya'o zhes bya @80a * //üîΩba'i don to //
analyzed: 'chad bzhin pa'i rigs pas lte ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i ai'i yi ge kha sbyor thig le'i sgras brjod par bya ba'i sngags kyi de kho na nyid la sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas rig par bya'o zhes bya @80a * // ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the verse is that the yogin who is engaged in the reality of mantra expressed by the sound of the drop of the conjoined letter ai located in the center of the navel should know.

original: gal te sngags kyi de nyid mchog la sbyor bas rig par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te sngags kyi de nyid mchog la sbyor bas rig par bya ba yin na /
translated: If it is to be known by engagement in the reality of mantra,

original: sngags kyi de nyid mchog ji lta bu zhe na /üîΩde'i phyir / sngags kyi de nyid mchog sbyor ba //
analyzed: sngags kyi de nyid mchog ji lta bu zhe na / de'i phyir / sngags kyi de nyid mchog sbyor ba //
translated: what is the supreme reality of mantra?üîΩTherefore, it is said:

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: The supreme engagement of the reality of mantra.

original: mchog gi sbyor ba'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: mchog gi sbyor ba'i ngo bo ste /
translated: The nature of supreme engagement

original: so so'i skye bo'i shes pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i shes pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is not the domain of the consciousness of ordinary beings.

original: gal te de ltar yin na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yin na /
translated: If it is like that,

original: ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /üîΩde'i phyir / bla ma'i zhal la rnam par gnas //
analyzed: ji ltar shes par bya zhe na / de'i phyir / bla ma'i zhal la rnam par gnas //
translated: how is it to be known?üîΩTherefore, it is said:

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It abides in the guru's mouth.

original: rgyud du bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyi zhal gyi lung las lhag par gnas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rgyud du bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyi zhal gyi lung las lhag par gnas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is superior to the oral instructions of a vajra master who possesses the characteristics taught in the tantras.

original: de ltar de'i thabs ston nas /
analyzed: de ltar de'i thabs ston nas /
translated: Having taught the method in that way,

original: de la nye bar mkho ba'i don gsol ba gdab pa'i yan lag gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir /üîΩde nas ston pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de la nye bar mkho ba'i don gsol ba gdab pa'i yan lag gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir / de nas ston pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
