translated: in order to request the limb of supplicating, which is necessary for that,üîΩthen the BhagavƒÅn, having taught the reality of mantra,

original: sngags kyi de nyid rtogs par bya ba nyid bstan pa'i rjes la phyag na rdo rje zhu ba pos so //
analyzed: sngags kyi de nyid rtogs par bya ba nyid bstan pa'i rjes la phyag na rdo rje zhu ba pos so //
translated: after VajrapƒÅ·πái, the petitioner,

original: ston pa zhes bya ba ni drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnam pa bcom ldan 'das la'o //
analyzed: ston pa zhes bya ba ni drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnam pa bcom ldan 'das la'o //
translated: the ‚Äúteacher‚Äù is the BhagavƒÅn, the form of the sixth, MahƒÅvajradhara.

original: zhus pa ni zhes bya ba ni /üîΩyongs su zhu ba dang ldan pa //
analyzed: zhus pa ni zhes bya ba ni / yongs su zhu ba dang ldan pa //
translated: ‚ÄúPetitioned‚Äù meansüîΩ‚Äúhaving made a request.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is endowed with a request.

original: rim pa gnyis bstan pas /
analyzed: rim pa gnyis bstan pas /
translated: Having taught the two stages,

original: phyin ci ma log pa gang zag rnam pa lnga'i rnam par 'jig rten la ston par byed pas na ston pa'o //
analyzed: phyin ci ma log pa gang zag rnam pa lnga'i rnam par 'jig rten la ston par byed pas na ston pa'o //
translated: the ‚Äúteacher‚Äù is the one who teaches the world the unerring five types of persons.

original: bla med la zhes bya ba ni de las gzhan gong na med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bla med la zhes bya ba ni de las gzhan gong na med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The unsurpassed is so called because there is nothing higher than it.

original: de yang bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de yang bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Moreover, it means the abandonment of all afflictive and cognitive obstructions along with their traces.

original: ci zhig zhus she na /
analyzed: ci zhig zhus she na /
translated: What was asked?

original: de'i phyir bcom ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bcom ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, he says, the Blessed One, etc.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad 'joms pas na bcom ldan no //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad 'joms pas na bcom ldan no //
translated: The Blessed One is so called because he has destroyed all adverse elements.

original: de la bod pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la bod pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He is also called the Blessed One because he has blessed others.

original: zhi ba'i de nyid mkhyen zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhi ba'i de nyid mkhyen zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The knower of peace and reality is so called because

original: nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bas na zhi ba'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bas na zhi ba'o //
translated: he has pacified all afflictions.

original: de nyid ni phyin ci ma log par ston pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de nyid ni phyin ci ma log par ston pa'i phyir te /
translated: Reality is so called because it is taught without error.

original: de mkhyen pas na zhi ba'i de nyid mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: de mkhyen pas na zhi ba'i de nyid mkhyen pa'o //
translated: He is the knower of peace and reality because he knows that.

original: de'i don la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i don la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He is also called the knower of peace and reality because of the meaning of that.

original: don dam pa'i bden pa yongs su shes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa yongs su shes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa'o //
translated: The intention is that it is because of the thorough knowledge of ultimate reality.

original: sngags kyi de nyid ces bya ba ni sgra tsam po'i thabs su gyur pa'o ;
analyzed: sngags kyi de nyid ces bya ba ni sgra tsam po'i thabs su gyur pa'o ;
translated: The so-called mantra reality is the means of mere sound.

original: / bshad par mdzad ces pa ni ston par mdzad ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: / bshad par mdzad ces pa ni ston par mdzad ces pa'i don to //
translated: The explains means the teaches. )

original: des ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: des ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: What does it do?

original: de'i phyir gang gis zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang gis zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said,

original: gang gis na sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyis so //
analyzed: gang gis na sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyis so //
translated: by which means, by the reality of the mantra.

original: rnam par shes pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni thos pa la sogs pa'i rim pas rtogs pa tsam gyis so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni thos pa la sogs pa'i rim pas rtogs pa tsam gyis so //
translated: By mere consciousness means by mere understanding through the stages of hearing and so forth.

original: grub par 'gyur @80b zhes bya ba di sgra tsam gyi da bos so //
analyzed: grub par 'gyur @80b zhes bya ba di sgra tsam gyi da bos so //
translated: Is accomplished is stated by the mere sound of the mantra.

original: de kho na nyid ces bya ba ni de kho na nyid mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ces bya ba ni de kho na nyid mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Reality is because of seeing reality.

original: de ltar gsol ba gdab pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar gsol ba gdab pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the supplication,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung la 'jug pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung la 'jug pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the engagement with the BhagavƒÅn's speech,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said,

original: gsol ba btab pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: gsol ba btab pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: after the supplication.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad zin to //
translated: BhagavƒÅn has been explained previously.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi de kho na nyid mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgsungs zhes bya ba ni de brjod cig pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi de kho na nyid mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro // gsungs zhes bya ba ni de brjod cig pa'o //
translated: The vajra is so called because it makes manifest the reality of emptiness.üîΩThe mantra is so called because it is uttered.

original: sngags kyi de nyid ces bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: sngags kyi de nyid ces bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The reality is so called because it has the characteristics that will be explained.

original: bla na med pa zhes bya ba ni spros pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa zhes bya ba ni spros pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is unsurpassed because it is free from conceptual elaboration.

original: de yang yi ge aa'i rnam pa nyid kyis 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de yang yi ge aa'i rnam pa nyid kyis 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It is also the letter A because it has the form of the letter A, as will be explained.

original: mchog dang rab mchog ces bya ba ni mchog ni sprul la sogs pas brdar byas pa'i sngags kyi tshogs so //
analyzed: mchog dang rab mchog ces bya ba ni mchog ni sprul la sogs pas brdar byas pa'i sngags kyi tshogs so //
translated: The supreme is so called because it is the collection of mantras that are conventionally formed by NirmƒÅ·πáakƒÅya and so forth.

original: rab mchog ces bya ba ni de rnams nye bar bsdus pa'i ngo bo aa yig go //
analyzed: rab mchog ces bya ba ni de rnams nye bar bsdus pa'i ngo bo aa yig go //
translated: The most supreme is so called because it is the essence that subsumes those, which is the letter A.

original: phra ba dang zhes bya ba ni rtogs par dka' ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: phra ba dang zhes bya ba ni rtogs par dka' ba nyid kyis so //
translated: It is subtle because it is difficult to realize.

original: ye shes chen po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ye shes chen po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is great wisdom

original: chos nyid mngon du byed pa'i rgyu de nyid kyis so //
analyzed: chos nyid mngon du byed pa'i rgyu de nyid kyis so //
translated: because it is the cause for realizing reality.

original: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The great bliss is the cause of generating the great bliss.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung la 'jug pa bstan nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung la 'jug pa bstan nas /
translated: Having taught the engagement in the speech of the Bhagavat,

original: sngags kyi de kho na nyid bshad par dam bca' ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sngags kyi de kho na nyid bshad par dam bca' ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain the reality of the mantra, he makes a promise:üîΩListen well to the essence of the essence,

original: yang dag bshad kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /üîΩmnyan par gyis zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yang dag bshad kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / mnyan par gyis zhes bya ba ni /
translated: the supreme essence, which I will explain well.

original: phyag na rdo rje thos pa la sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje thos pa la sbyar ba'o //
translated: Listen well means that VajrapƒÅ·πái should apply himself to hearing.

original: yang dag bshad kyis zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i lhag ma'o //
analyzed: yang dag bshad kyis zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i lhag ma'o //
translated: Explain well is the remainder of the reality of the mantra.

original: snying bo las kyang snying po mchog / ces bya ba ni de ma thag tu bshad pa rnams so //
analyzed: snying bo las kyang snying po mchog / ces bya ba ni de ma thag tu bshad pa rnams so //
translated: The essence of the essence is the immediately explained ones.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The supreme is to be realized by the yogi who abides in the perfection stage.

original: rgyud rnams kun du sbas pa rnams //
analyzed: rgyud rnams kun du sbas pa rnams //
translated: The hidden ones in all the tantras

original: zhes bya ba ni bya ba dang spyod pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bya ba dang spyod pa rnams la'o //
translated: means in the Action and Performance tantras.

original: gsang ba'i zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang mi ldan pa rnams la bshad pa'i snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsang ba'i zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang mi ldan pa rnams la bshad pa'i snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The secret is because it is not a vessel for explaining to those who do not have the commitments.

original: go 'phang zhes bya ba ni 'dug pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: go 'phang zhes bya ba ni 'dug pa'i gnas so //
translated: The state is the place of dwelling.

original: 'pho ba med ces bya ba ni 'jigs pa las spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'pho ba med ces bya ba ni 'jigs pa las spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The non-transference is because it is free from fear.

original: de ltar sngags kyi de kho na nyid bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar sngags kyi de kho na nyid bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the reality of mantra,

original: dngos su de brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos su de brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: he says that in reality it is that.

original: lte ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: lte ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says the navel wheel, etc.

original: sprul pa'i 'khor lo rtsa 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid can no //üîΩde nyid mchog ces bya ba ni mchog @81a * //
analyzed: sprul pa'i 'khor lo rtsa 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid can no // de nyid mchog ces bya ba ni mchog @81a * //
translated: The emanation wheel is the nature of sixty-four channel petals.

original: gi de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: gi de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: That itself is supreme, which is the nature of the supreme reality.

original: yang dag gnas zhes bya ba ni yi ge'i ngo bo aa'i yi ge'i dbyibs can no //
analyzed: yang dag gnas zhes bya ba ni yi ge'i ngo bo aa'i yi ge'i dbyibs can no //
translated: The true abode is the nature of the syllable, the shape of the syllable A.

original: sgra tsam du ni zhes bya ba ni thig le'i sgras brjod pa'o //
analyzed: sgra tsam du ni zhes bya ba ni thig le'i sgras brjod pa'o //
translated: The mere sound is expressed by the term drop.

original: stong pa chen po'i mthar ni thim //
analyzed: stong pa chen po'i mthar ni thim //
translated: Dissolves in the end of the great emptiness.

original: zhes bya ba ni thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin /
translated: This is the nature of the emptiness of everything.

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo ste /
translated: The nature of the clear light by nature.

original: stong pa dang shin tu stong pa dang stong pa chen po rnams kyi mthar nye bar dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa dang shin tu stong pa dang stong pa chen po rnams kyi mthar nye bar dmigs pa'o //
translated: The end of emptiness, great emptiness, and supreme emptiness is perceived.

original: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gsal //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gsal //
translated: The state of great bliss is clear.

original: zhes bya ba ni de la brten nas bde ba chen po'i rnam pa gnyis dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de la brten nas bde ba chen po'i rnam pa gnyis dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the two aspects of great bliss are perceived in dependence on that.

original: gsal ba zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi lag pa'i mthil du skyu ru ra gzhag pa ltar nye bar dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi lag pa'i mthil du skyu ru ra gzhag pa ltar nye bar dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Clear means that it is perceived by yogins and yoginƒ´s as if a myrobalan fruit were placed in the palm of the hand.

original: gnyis med ces bya ba ni bsgom bya dang sgom pa po'i snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis med ces bya ba ni bsgom bya dang sgom pa po'i snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Nondual means that the appearance of the object of meditation and the meditator do not exist.

original: mi 'jigs zhes bya ba ni gnyis snang ba las skyes pa'i las kyi bag chags kyi 'jigs pa med pas so //
analyzed: mi 'jigs zhes bya ba ni gnyis snang ba las skyes pa'i las kyi bag chags kyi 'jigs pa med pas so //
translated: Fearless means that there is no fear of the latent tendencies of karma produced by the appearance of duality.

original: zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Peaceful means

original: las kyi dbang gis skyes pa'i skye ba bzlog pas so //
analyzed: las kyi dbang gis skyes pa'i skye ba bzlog pas so //
translated: that birth produced by the power of karma is reversed.

original: snang ba med cing zhes bya ba ni sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i snang ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba med cing zhes bya ba ni sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i snang ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout appearance‚Äù means that it is free from the appearance of blue, yellow, and so forth.

original: kun rdzob med ces bya ba ni don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩting 'dzin gnyis mad sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: kun rdzob med ces bya ba ni don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro // ting 'dzin gnyis mad sbyor ba yis //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout conventional‚Äù means that it is the nature of ultimate bodhicitta.

original: zhes bya ba ni aa yig gi ngo bo sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas pa dang / gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni aa yig gi ngo bo sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas pa dang / gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúBy the yoga of the nondual samƒÅdhi‚Äù means that it is the nature of the letter A located in the emanation wheel and the yoga of nonduality.

original: tha mi dad par rtogs pa thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i ngo bos so //
analyzed: tha mi dad par rtogs pa thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i ngo bos so //
translated: It is the realization of nondifference, the nature of the union of method and wisdom.

original: sngags kyi de nyid ces bya ba ni aa yig gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi de nyid ces bya ba ni aa yig gi ngo bo'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe reality of mantra‚Äù means the nature of the letter A.

original: rab gsal ba zhes bya ba ni rab tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rab gsal ba zhes bya ba ni rab tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúClearly manifest‚Äù means ‚Äúclearly illuminating.‚Äù

original: de ltar don rnam pa bzhis de la mkho ba'i don nye bar brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa bzhis de la mkho ba'i don nye bar brjod nas /
translated: Having thus stated the meaning of the necessary terms,

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to state the nature of bodhicitta,

original: de'i yan lag mdor bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i yan lag mdor bstan pa ni /
translated: the brief explanation of its branches is as follows:

original: thog ma med cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: thog ma med cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The line beginningless and so forth is stated.

original: thog ma zhes bya ba ni skye ba'o //
analyzed: thog ma zhes bya ba ni skye ba'o //
translated: The beginning is arising.

original: tha ma zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: tha ma zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa'o //
translated: The end is destruction.

original: de dag med pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste /
analyzed: de dag med pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste /
translated: Since those do not exist, there is no beginning or end.

original: chos kyi dbyings sems kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings sems kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: That is the basic element of phenomena, the nature of mind.

original: de nyid ni byang chub kyi sems te /
analyzed: de nyid ni byang chub kyi sems te /
translated: That itself is the mind of awakening.

original: de'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the beginningless and endless

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i don gyis so //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i don gyis so //
translated: is the meaning of Great Vajradhara.

original: zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni sems las tha dad pa don brtags pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyi don gyis so //
analyzed: zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni sems las tha dad pa don brtags pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyi don gyis so //
translated: The line peace and so forth is stated. Peace is the meaning of Vairocana because of the pacification of the imagined object that is different from the mind.

original: dngos @81b dang dngos med zad pa'i gtso //
analyzed: dngos @81b dang dngos med zad pa'i gtso //
translated: The line the chief of the exhaustion of things and nonthings

original: zhes bya ba ni chos dang chos nyid kyi mtshan ma rnams med pa'i phyir mi bskyod pa'i don gyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chos dang chos nyid kyi mtshan ma rnams med pa'i phyir mi bskyod pa'i don gyis so //
translated: is the meaning of Akshobhya because of the absence of the signs of phenomena and the dharmata.

original: gtso zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings tsam bo'i bdag nyid dang sangs rgyas thams cad la dbye ba ma mthong ba'i phyir gtso bo ni thams cad du 'gro ba rin chen 'byung ldan gyi don gyis so//
analyzed: gtso zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings tsam bo'i bdag nyid dang sangs rgyas thams cad la dbye ba ma mthong ba'i phyir gtso bo ni thams cad du 'gro ba rin chen 'byung ldan gyi don gyis so//
translated: The word ‚Äúchief‚Äù is used because of the identity of the mere realm of phenomena and the non-apprehension of any distinction among all buddhas, and the meaning of Ratnasa·πÉbhava is ‚Äúchief.‚Äù

original: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //
analyzed: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //
translated: The indivisibility of emptiness and compassion

original: zhes bya ba ni mtshon bya dang mtshon byed la sogs pa la rnam pa thams cad du stong pa nyid kyis yongs su dpyad pa'i phyir stong pa nyid dang tha mi dad de /üîΩ'od dpag med kyi don gyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mtshon bya dang mtshon byed la sogs pa la rnam pa thams cad du stong pa nyid kyis yongs su dpyad pa'i phyir stong pa nyid dang tha mi dad de / 'od dpag med kyi don gyis so //
translated: is used because of the complete analysis of all aspects of the object of expression, the means of expression, and so on, by emptiness, and the meaning of AmitƒÅbha is ‚Äúindivisible.‚Äù

original: chos kyi dbyings tsam po'i bdag nyid kyis sna tshogs pa'i don byed pa'i phyir snying rje dang tha mi dad pa ste don yod grub pa'i don gyis so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings tsam po'i bdag nyid kyis sna tshogs pa'i don byed pa'i phyir snying rje dang tha mi dad pa ste don yod grub pa'i don gyis so //
translated: The indivisibility of compassion is used because of the identity of the mere realm of phenomena and the performance of various benefits, and the meaning of Amoghasiddhi is ‚Äúindivisible.‚Äù

original: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of awakening mind

original: zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems kyi don 'di nyid ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems kyi don 'di nyid ni /
translated: is used because of the meaning of awakening mind.

original: sangs rgyas lba rnams kyi chos nyid kyis snying la zhugs pa'i don gyis snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lba rnams kyi chos nyid kyis snying la zhugs pa'i don gyis snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the statement ‚Äúthe dharmatƒÅ of all buddhas‚Äù is that it is present in the heart.

original: de ltar mdor bstan pa bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan pa bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the brief presentation,

original: rgyas par bshad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyas par bshad pa bstan pa'i phyir /

original: de tshe thog ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de tshe thog ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚ÄúAt that time, the beginning,‚Äù and so on.

original: mdor bstan pa'i skabs su bshad pa'i thog ma dang tha ma'i tshig ni stong nyid 'gyur zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: mdor bstan pa'i skabs su bshad pa'i thog ma dang tha ma'i tshig ni stong nyid 'gyur zhes gsungs te /
translated: The words ‚Äúbeginning‚Äù and ‚Äúend‚Äù explained in the context of the brief presentation are stated as ‚Äúemptiness‚Äù and ‚Äúnon-emptiness.‚Äù

original: stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Emptiness is unconditioned.

original: dmigs pa med pa'i go 'phang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i go 'phang zhes bya ba ni /

original: 'dis ni zhi ba'i tshig bshad pa ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni zhi ba'i tshig bshad pa ste /
translated: is explained as ‚Äúpeace.‚Äù

original: dmigs pa thams cad spangs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa thams cad spangs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhi ba zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhi ba zhes bya ba gsungs te /

original: sems las tha dad pa'i don gyi rtog pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems las tha dad pa'i don gyi rtog pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the conception of an object that is different from the mind is pacified.

original: rang bzhin med pa'i gnas zhes bya ba ni 'dis ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa zad pa'i tshig bshad do //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'i gnas zhes bya ba ni 'dis ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa zad pa'i tshig bshad do //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúabode of essencelessness‚Äù explains the exhaustion of entities and nonentities.

original: chos dang chos nyid kyi rgyu mtshan nub pa nyid kyis rang bzhin bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos dang chos nyid kyi rgyu mtshan nub pa nyid kyis rang bzhin bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the signs of phenomena and their reality disappear, their essences are reversed.

original: nyams dga' zhes bya ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo'i phyir nyams dga' ba'o //
analyzed: nyams dga' zhes bya ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo'i phyir nyams dga' ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúDelightful‚Äù means delightful because of being the essence of the extremely pure realm of reality.

original: rnam par rtog pa med la brten //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med la brten //
translated: It is the support for the nonconceptual.

original: zhes bya ba 'dis ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis ni /
translated: This

original: gtso bo'i tshig gis rgyas par bshad pa ste /
analyzed: gtso bo'i tshig gis rgyas par bshad pa ste /
translated: is the extensive explanation by way of the principal term.

original: de yang chos kyi dbyings tsam gyi bdag nyid dang / sangs rgyas thams cad tha mi dad pa'i mthong bas rnam par rtog pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rten du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang chos kyi dbyings tsam gyi bdag nyid dang / sangs rgyas thams cad tha mi dad pa'i mthong bas rnam par rtog pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rten du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, it is the support for the wisdom of the sameness of conceptualization because it is the nature of the mere realm of reality and because it is seen as undifferentiated from all buddhas.

original: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i rnam par rtog pa bzlog pas khyad par can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i rnam par rtog pa bzlog pas khyad par can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúSupreme‚Äù means that it is special because it reverses the conceptualization of differentiation.

original: stong nyid ya shes mtshungs pa med //
analyzed: stong nyid ya shes mtshungs pa med //

original: ces bya ba ni 'dis ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni 'dis ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the extensive explanation of the word ‚Äúemptiness.‚Äù

original: @82a * // snga ma bzhin du mtshon bya dang mtshon byed la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad du stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bcad pas /
analyzed: @82a * // snga ma bzhin du mtshon bya dang mtshon byed la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad du stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bcad pas /

original: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: This is the wisdom of emptiness.

original: de nyid ni mtshungs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni mtshungs pa med pa ste /
translated: It is itself unequaled,

original: phyogs gcig pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩbyang chub sems zhes 'di la grags //
analyzed: phyogs gcig pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro // byang chub sems zhes 'di la grags //

original: zhes bya bas ni /
analyzed: zhes bya bas ni /

original: 'dis ni snying rje tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni snying rje tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the extensive explanation of ‚Äúthe thought of awakening is not different.‚Äù

original: snga ma bzhin du chos kyi dbyings tsam gyi bdag nyid kyis sna tshogs pa'i don byed pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems zhes 'di la grags so //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du chos kyi dbyings tsam gyi bdag nyid kyis sna tshogs pa'i don byed pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems zhes 'di la grags so //
translated: As before, it is renowned as the thought of awakening because it performs various benefits by means of the identity of the mere expanse of reality.

original: de gzhan gyi don la brten pa nyid do snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de gzhan gyi don la brten pa nyid do snyam du dgongs pa'o //

original: de ltar rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas ;
analyzed: de ltar rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas ;
translated: Having taught the extensive explanation in that way,

original: so sor rgyas par bshad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: so sor rgyas par bshad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the individual extensive explanations, he says:

original: yi ge h'um las yang dag byung //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: yi ge h'um las yang dag byung // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: arising from the syllable h≈´·πÉ,

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because of being the essence of Great Vajradhara.

original: rnal 'byor rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni rim pa gnyis sgom pa po'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rnal 'byor pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni rim pa gnyis sgom pa po'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rnal 'byor pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The ‚Äúrealization of the yogi‚Äù is for the yogis who meditate on the two stages to realize the yogi.

original: rmad byung che zhes bya ba ni 'bad pa med pa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rmad byung che zhes bya ba ni 'bad pa med pa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúGreat wonder‚Äù is because of displaying various miracles without effort.

original: 'dis ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i tshig mdor bstan pa'i skabs su bshad pa'i don bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i tshig mdor bstan pa'i skabs su bshad pa'i don bshad pa'o //
translated: This explains the meaning of the statement of the beginningless and endless in the brief explanation section.

original: de nyid gsung ni ro gcig don //
analyzed: de nyid gsung ni ro gcig don //
translated: The speech of reality is the meaning of one taste.

original: zhes bya ba ni gsum ni lus ngag yid gsum gyi de kho na nyid dang / dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo rnams stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gsum ni lus ngag yid gsum gyi de kho na nyid dang / dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo rnams stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo ste /
translated: The three are the reality of body, speech, and mind, and the entities of the sense faculties, objects, and consciousnesses are of one taste with emptiness, with an essence of non-difference.

original: de nyid don ni dgos pa 'di la yod pas na /
analyzed: de nyid don ni dgos pa 'di la yod pas na /
translated: The meaning of reality is present in this, therefore,

original: des na de nyid gsum ni ro gcig pa'i don zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des na de nyid gsum ni ro gcig pa'i don zhes bya'o //
translated: it is called the meaning of the one taste of the three realities.

original: 'dis ni zhi ba zhes bya ba dang dmigs pa med pa'i tshig dang zhi ba la sogs pa rnams kyi don bshad do//
analyzed: 'dis ni zhi ba zhes bya ba dang dmigs pa med pa'i tshig dang zhi ba la sogs pa rnams kyi don bshad do//
translated: This explains the words ‚Äúpeace‚Äù and ‚Äúobjectless‚Äù and the meaning of ‚Äúpeace‚Äù and so on.

original: aa ba dh'u t'i'i go 'phang gsal //
analyzed: aa ba dh'u t'i'i go 'phang gsal //
translated: The state of the avadh≈´tƒ´ is clear.

original: zhes bya ba ni spros pa thams cad bzlog nas stong pa nyid kyi don ni aa ba dh'u t'i'i rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid can yongs su shes pa ni aa ba dh'u t'i'i go 'phang ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni spros pa thams cad bzlog nas stong pa nyid kyi don ni aa ba dh'u t'i'i rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid can yongs su shes pa ni aa ba dh'u t'i'i go 'phang ngo //
translated: Having stopped all conceptual elaboration, the meaning of emptiness, which is the nature of the avadh≈´tƒ´ concept, is the state of the avadh≈´tƒ´.

original: gsal zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum gyis yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum gyis yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúClear‚Äù means that it is complete because of being the direct perception of yoga.

original: lhan cig skyes dga'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes dga'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the union of innate bliss,

original: zhes bya ba ni dga' ba dang mchog dga' gnyis kyi bdag nyid can dngos po'i bdag nyid dang / dga' bral dngos po'i bdag nyid can zad pa'i ngo bo lhan cig pa'i rnam pa'i de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dga' ba dang mchog dga' gnyis kyi bdag nyid can dngos po'i bdag nyid dang / dga' bral dngos po'i bdag nyid can zad pa'i ngo bo lhan cig pa'i rnam pa'i de kho na nyid do //
translated: This is the reality of the innate, which has the nature of the two, joy and supreme joy, and the reality of the separation from joy, which has the nature of the exhaustion of things.

original: de dang sbyor ba ni de dang rtse gcig pa'i sbyor bas so //
analyzed: de dang sbyor ba ni de dang rtse gcig pa'i sbyor bas so //
translated: The union with that is the union with that, with one-pointedness.

original: 'jug pa la sogs @82b rnam par spangs //
analyzed: 'jug pa la sogs @82b rnam par spangs //
translated: Free from the aspects of entry and so forth

original: zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i thabs su gyur pa 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang ba spangs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i thabs su gyur pa 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang ba spangs te /

original: lhan cig skyes pa thob pa la thabs su gyur pa'i rlung rnams nub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa thob pa la thabs su gyur pa'i rlung rnams nub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the winds that are the means for attaining the innate have subsided.

original: 'di dag gis dngos po dang dngos po'i tshig dang / rang bzhin med pa'i tshig gi don bshad do //
analyzed: 'di dag gis dngos po dang dngos po'i tshig dang / rang bzhin med pa'i tshig gi don bshad do //
translated: These explain the meaning of the words of the thing and the absence of intrinsic nature.üîΩThe state of great bliss

original: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means that.

original: khrag gi rnam pa rdo rje nyi ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis bde ba chen po skyes pa'i rgyur gyur pa nyid kyi phyir bde ba chen po'i go 'phang ngo //
analyzed: khrag gi rnam pa rdo rje nyi ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis bde ba chen po skyes pa'i rgyur gyur pa nyid kyi phyir bde ba chen po'i go 'phang ngo //
translated: The form of blood, having the nature of the sun-vajra, is the cause of the arising of great bliss, and thus it is the state of great bliss.

original: zhi zhes bya ba ni de'i snang ba nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhi zhes bya ba ni de'i snang ba nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúPeace‚Äù means the pacification of its appearance.

original: byang chub kyi sems ni zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems ni zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi rnam pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBodhicitta‚Äù is the conventional form.

original: dri ma zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pas ma gos pa ste /
analyzed: dri ma zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pas ma gos pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúStainless‚Äù means uncontaminated by desire and so forth.

original: 'dis ni gtso bo'i tshig dang rnam par mi rtog pa la brten pa'i tshig gi don gsungs so //üîΩsna tshogs skad cig dbyer med pa //
analyzed: 'dis ni gtso bo'i tshig dang rnam par mi rtog pa la brten pa'i tshig gi don gsungs so // sna tshogs skad cig dbyer med pa //
translated: This teaches the meaning of the words of the principal one and the words based on nonconceptuality.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / rnam par smin pa dang / rnam par nyed pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i ngo bo skad cig ma rnams dang gnyis su med pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / rnam par smin pa dang / rnam par nyed pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i ngo bo skad cig ma rnams dang gnyis su med pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe variety is indivisible from the instant‚Äù means that the variety, the ripening, the subsiding, and the nature free from characteristics are indivisible from the instants.

original: gnyis kyis rnam par rtog pa bzlog pa'i bdag nyid can te /
analyzed: gnyis kyis rnam par rtog pa bzlog pa'i bdag nyid can te /
translated: It is the nature that turns away the two concepts.

original: de rnams la khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams la khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because they pervade them all.

original: brjod pa'i bdag nyid dbyangs bral ba //
analyzed: brjod pa'i bdag nyid dbyangs bral ba //
translated: The nature of expression is devoid of sound.

original: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo na gnas pa'i ham gi yi ge kun rdzob byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid can brjod par bya ba'i bdag nyid dang nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo na gnas pa'i ham gi yi ge kun rdzob byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid can brjod par bya ba'i bdag nyid dang nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The letter ham, which is located in the wheel of great bliss, has the nature of relative bodhicitta, and is the nature of the expressed and the nature of experience.

original: 'dis ni mngon du gsungs pa'i stong pa nyid dang / tha mi dad pa'i tshig stong pa nyid kyi ye shes mtshungs pa med ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dis ni mngon du gsungs pa'i stong pa nyid dang / tha mi dad pa'i tshig stong pa nyid kyi ye shes mtshungs pa med ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: This refers to the emptiness that is directly stated, and the statement that is not different from it, which is the meaning of the statement ‚Äúthe wisdom of emptiness is unequaled.‚Äù

original: rtag tu gnas pa'i rgyud kyis kyang ;
analyzed: rtag tu gnas pa'i rgyud kyis kyang ;
translated: And by the stream of the always present,

original: / zhes bya ba ni nyin mtshan du kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems 'bab par byed cing gnas pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus la'o //
analyzed: / zhes bya ba ni nyin mtshan du kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems 'bab par byed cing gnas pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus la'o //
translated: The relative bodhicitta flows day and night and abides, that is, in one‚Äôs body.

original: de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems ni 'bab par gyur pas zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems ni 'bab par gyur pas zhes gsungs so //
translated: For that very reason, it is said that ‚Äúthe bodhicitta flows.‚Äù

original: chad pa'i phyogs spangs nas ye shes kyi rim pa'i skabs su snying rje chen po'i rdzas 'bab pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'dis ni snying rje dang tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba 'di dang ; byang chub sems zhes 'di la grags //
analyzed: chad pa'i phyogs spangs nas ye shes kyi rim pa'i skabs su snying rje chen po'i rdzas 'bab pa'i phyir ro // 'dis ni snying rje dang tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba 'di dang ; byang chub sems zhes 'di la grags //
translated: Having abandoned the extreme of nihilism, because of the descent of the substance of great compassion in the stage of intuition.

original: zhes bya ba 'di yi don rgyas par bshad par byas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di yi don rgyas par bshad par byas so //
translated: This explains the meaning of the statement, ‚ÄúIt is not different from compassion,‚Äù and ‚ÄúIt is renowned as the thought of enlightenment.‚Äù

original: de ltar rnam pa gsum gyis byang chub sems kyi ngo bo bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa gsum gyis byang chub sems kyi ngo bo bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the essence of the thought of enlightenment in three ways,

original: da ni thabs rjes su brjod pas rang gis rig par bya ba nyid bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩsngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni 'thob //
analyzed: da ni thabs rjes su brjod pas rang gis rig par bya ba nyid bstan pa'i phyir / sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni 'thob //
translated: now, in order to teach the means of realization by oneself through the expression of the method,

original: ces gsungs @83a * //
analyzed: ces gsungs @83a * //
translated: he says, ‚ÄúIt is attained by the yoga of mantra.‚Äù

original: te ; lte ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i aa yig gi rnam pa'i sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis so //
analyzed: te ; lte ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i aa yig gi rnam pa'i sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis so //
translated: By the yoga of mantra, which is in the form of the letter A located in the center of the navel.

original: 'thob ces bya ba ni sgra tsam po'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'thob ces bya ba ni sgra tsam po'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúAttained‚Äù means ‚Äúin the form of mere sound.‚Äù

original: thig le tsam zhes bya ba ni phra ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: thig le tsam zhes bya ba ni phra ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúMerely a drop‚Äù means ‚Äúmerely subtle.‚Äù

original: skye med ces bya ba ni rgyu dang rkyen gyi stobs kyis skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye med ces bya ba ni rgyu dang rkyen gyi stobs kyis skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The unborn is because of non-arising by the power of causes and conditions.

original: zhi ba'i zhes bya ba ni de'i ngo bo nye bar mtshon pas sangs rgyas kyi chos dge ba byed pa rnams mngon par 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhi ba'i zhes bya ba ni de'i ngo bo nye bar mtshon pas sangs rgyas kyi chos dge ba byed pa rnams mngon par 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The peaceful is because of the manifestation of the virtuous qualities of the Buddha by the indication of its nature.

original: rang rig pa zhes bya ba ni sgra dang rnam par rtog pas brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyis so so rang gis rig par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang rig pa zhes bya ba ni sgra dang rnam par rtog pas brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyis so so rang gis rig par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The self-cognizant is because of being an object of individual intuitive wisdom by not being expressible by sound or conceptual thought.

original: ye shes mchog ces bya ba ni snang ba thams cad nub par gyur bas bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ye shes mchog ces bya ba ni snang ba thams cad nub par gyur bas bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The supreme intuition is because of the nature of the unsurpassed intuition by the setting of all appearances.

original: sngags kyi spyod pa spyad pas na //
analyzed: sngags kyi spyod pa spyad pas na //
translated: By practicing the mantra conduct,

original: zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi spyod pa rnam pa gnyis kyis gang zhig gnas pa de rnams la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi spyod pa rnam pa gnyis kyis gang zhig gnas pa de rnams la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: those who abide by the two kinds of mantra conduct are called those who practice the mantra conduct.

original: de rnams ni sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de rnams ni sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /

original: pandi ta aa langka ka la shas mdzad pa /
analyzed: pandi ta aa langka ka la shas mdzad pa /
translated: Composed by the Pa·πá·∏çita Ala·πÉkakala≈õa

analyzed: zab mo'i don gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las le'u bcu gcig pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /

analyzed: // / de ltar le'u bcu gcig pas sgra tsam gyi don gtan la phab nas /
translated: Thus, having ascertained the meaning of mere words with the eleventh chapter,

original: da ni rlung gi de kho na nyid la dri ba'i lan bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rlung gi de kho na nyid la dri ba'i lan bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /

analyzed: le'u bcu gcig pa bshad pa'i rjes la'o //

analyzed: rlung gi de nyid don zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid do //

analyzed: nyon zhes bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje la bod pa'o //

analyzed: bshad kyis zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya yis zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: de nyid mchog ces bya ba ni thabs sgom pa sngon du 'gro bas zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: des ci zhig 'grub ce na /üîΩde'i phyir / myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: des ci zhig 'grub ce na / de'i phyir / myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
translated: What is accomplished by that?üîΩTherefore, it is said:

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: One will quickly attain power.

analyzed: myur ba nyid du rdo rje bzlas pa 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //

original: gang gis zhes bya ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid kyis so //
analyzed: gang gis zhes bya ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid kyis so //

analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ni ting nge 'dzin te /üîΩgang la yod pa de rnams la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The yogi is one for whom yoga, that is, samadhi, exists.

original: rlung bsgoms na zhes bya ba ni rlung ni rnam pa lnga'am rnam pa bcu sgom par byed cing nye bar @83b mtshon par byed pas na /
analyzed: rlung bsgoms na zhes bya ba ni rlung ni rnam pa lnga'am rnam pa bcu sgom par byed cing nye bar @83b mtshon par byed pas na /

original: de'i rlung sgom pa po ste /
analyzed: de'i rlung sgom pa po ste /

original: de rnams so //

analyzed: de ltar rlung gi de kho na nyid kyi yul la dri ba'i lan rtsom pa bstan nas /

analyzed: dngos su rlung gi de kho na nyid bstan pa brjod pa'i phyir /

analyzed: de'i yan lag gi ngo bo ni rlung gi thig le zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

original: rig pa'i dang tshul can gyi phyir thig le'o //
analyzed: rig pa'i dang tshul can gyi phyir thig le'o //

analyzed: ye shes che zhes bya ba ni ye shes chen po dang lhan cig tu zha bo dang long ba bzhin du 'brel ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: bshad bya zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ba'o //

analyzed: rlung gi bshad pa bstan zin to //

original: de kho na nyid kyi tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi tshig bstan pa'i phyir /

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /

original: yam yig don gyi gang cung zad //
analyzed: yam yig don gyi gang cung zad //

analyzed: dngos grub 'dod pas thams cad bya //

original: ram yig la sogs gsum gyis kyang //üîΩ'gro ba'i don la rab tu 'jug //
analyzed: ram yig la sogs gsum gyis kyang // 'gro ba'i don la rab tu 'jug //
translated: Also, by the three [winds] beginning with ram,

original: ces gsungs te /
analyzed: ces gsungs te /

original: gsungs zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs zhes bya ba ni brjod pa'o //

original: gnyis med rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phyir dang / rlung dang / sngags dang / lha dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rnams la gnyis su snang ba la sogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis med rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phyir dang / rlung dang / sngags dang / lha dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rnams la gnyis su snang ba la sogs pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: gzhan yang mi zad cho zhes bya ba ni zad pa med pa'i phyir ro //

original: skye med ces bya ba ni skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye med ces bya ba ni skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //

original: kun 'gro zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi 'byung ba chen po dang / lus kyi 'byung ba chen po rnams la thams cad du khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni rlung gi stobs kyis byung ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshogs nye bar zhi ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúTranquilizing‚Äù means that it pacifies the collection of natures that arise from the power of the wind.

original: khyab par byed ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: khyab par byed ces bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúPervading‚Äù means

original: ngag gi de kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ngag gi de kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: that it is the nature of the reality of speech.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba ni 'od gsal gyi rnam pas sems kyi spyod yul las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba ni 'od gsal gyi rnam pas sems kyi spyod yul las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúInconceivable‚Äù means that it is beyond the scope of the mind due to the aspect of luminosity.

original: stong pa zhes bya ba ni don dam par rang gi ngo bo med dpas so //
analyzed: stong pa zhes bya ba ni don dam par rang gi ngo bo med dpas so //
translated: ‚ÄúEmpty‚Äù means that it is ultimately devoid of its own nature.

original: de yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: dri med ces bya ba ni sngags rgyas kyi rnam par yongs su shes pas dri ma med pa'o //
analyzed: dri med ces bya ba ni sngags rgyas kyi rnam par yongs su shes pas dri ma med pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúStainless‚Äù means that it is stainless due to the complete understanding of the aspects of mantra and seal.

original: thams cad bdag nyid ces bya ba ni rlung gi ngo bo thams cad du 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rnams la'o //
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid ces bya ba ni rlung gi ngo bo thams cad du 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rnams la'o //
translated: All of them are one‚Äôs own nature means that the nature of the vƒÅyu is the ma·πá·∏çala of the four great elements that occur everywhere.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus rtag par ro //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus rtag par ro //

original: bzhugs zhes bya ba ni rten pa'o //
analyzed: bzhugs zhes bya ba ni rten pa'o //
translated: Abides means to be supported.

original: @84a * // sgom pa dang bsam gtan rnal 'byor gyis zhes bya ba ni sgom pa ni lus ngag yid gsum gyi ngo bo dang / 'byung ba dang rngub pa dran pa'o //
analyzed: @84a * // sgom pa dang bsam gtan rnal 'byor gyis zhes bya ba ni sgom pa ni lus ngag yid gsum gyi ngo bo dang / 'byung ba dang rngub pa dran pa'o //
translated: The meditation, concentration, and yoga means that meditation is the essence of body, voice, and mind, and the mindfulness of exhalation and inhalation.

original: bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rlung gi rang bzhin sems dpa'o //üîΩbsgom pa yang yin la /
analyzed: bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rlung gi rang bzhin sems dpa'o // bsgom pa yang yin la /

analyzed: bsam gtan yang yin pas na de skad ces bya'o //

original: de dag nyid ni rnal 'byor te sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de dag nyid ni rnal 'byor te sbyor ba'o //

original: des rtogs pas na rtogs pa'o //üîΩthig le rang gi ngo bo shes //
analyzed: des rtogs pas na rtogs pa'o // thig le rang gi ngo bo shes //

original: zhes bya ba ni thig le rnam pa gsum gyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thig le rnam pa gsum gyi ngo bo'o //

original: chos rnams gcig tu gyur pa'i gnas //
analyzed: chos rnams gcig tu gyur pa'i gnas //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi phung po lnga'i mtshan nyid can no ;
translated: This is the characteristic of the five aggregates of all phenomena.

analyzed: / gcig nyid gnas gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which exists in the place of oneness is called that.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: srog ni rnam shes phung po ste //
analyzed: srog ni rnam shes phung po ste //

original: thur sel tshor ba'i phung po'o //
analyzed: thur sel tshor ba'i phung po'o //
translated: The downward wind is the aggregate of feeling.

original: mnyam gnas 'du shes phung po ste //
analyzed: mnyam gnas 'du shes phung po ste //

original: 'du byed du grags gyen du rgyu //
analyzed: 'du byed du grags gyen du rgyu //

analyzed: phung po lnga ni rnam pa'o // zhes gsungs so ;

original: / sngags kyi de nyid rgyu zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi rgyur gyur pa rnam pa bzhi po rnams rlung gi dbang gis aa yig la sogs pa ma mo bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / sngags kyi de nyid rgyu zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi rgyur gyur pa rnam pa bzhi po rnams rlung gi dbang gis aa yig la sogs pa ma mo bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The reality of mantra is the cause means that the four kinds of reality of mantra are the cause of the generation of the mƒÅtrkƒÅ such as the letter A by the power of the wind.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: rlung gi de nyid sngon 'gro bas //üîΩsngags kyi de nyid dbang du bya //
analyzed: rlung gi de nyid sngon 'gro bas // sngags kyi de nyid dbang du bya //
translated: The reality of wind is the preliminary.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: The reality of mantra is brought under control.

original: bag chags kun las rnam par grol //
analyzed: bag chags kun las rnam par grol //
translated: Liberated from all habitual tendencies.

original: zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa rnam pa gnyis bsgoms pas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa rnam pa gnyis bsgoms pas /
translated: This is because, by cultivating the two aspects of the creation stage,

original: bag chags kyi ngo bo phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams kyi snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bag chags kyi ngo bo phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams kyi snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the appearances of the aggregates, elements, and media, which are the entities of the habitual tendencies, do not exist.

analyzed: kun mkhyen zhes bya ba ni gyen du rgyu ba la sogs pa dbang po'i rlung lnga'i stobs kyis dbang po re re la yul thams cad snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Omniscience is because of the power of the five sense-organs' winds, such as the upward-moving, etc., each sense-organ appears as all objects.

analyzed: bde ba kun ster ba zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang las kyi dbang gis skye ba nas bzlog pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: sna yi rtse mor de nyid mchog / ces bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi sna'i rtse mor ro //

analyzed: de nyid mchog ces bya ba ni mchog gi ngo bo de nyid ni /

analyzed: ngag gi 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid la rgyur gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: bsam par bya zhes bya ba ni yungs kar gyi 'bras bu'i tshad tsam du bsam par bya'o //

original: 'od zer thig le zhes bya ba ni rlung lnga nye bar bsdus pa'i rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'od zer thig le zhes bya ba ni rlung lnga nye bar bsdus pa'i rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: ji ltar zhe na /üîΩde'i phyir / srog dang rtsol ba yang dag sbyor //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / de'i phyir / srog dang rtsol ba yang dag sbyor //
translated: How?

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúthe union of prƒÅ·πáa and ƒÅyƒÅma.‚Äù

original: srog dang @84b rtsol ba gnyis 'jug pa dang ldang ba'i ngo bo dag la mnyam par sbyor ba rlung rnam pa lnga nye bar bsdus pa'i ngo bo de'i rtags pa yid la mngon du phyogs pa'i ngo bo de sngon du 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: srog dang @84b rtsol ba gnyis 'jug pa dang ldang ba'i ngo bo dag la mnyam par sbyor ba rlung rnam pa lnga nye bar bsdus pa'i ngo bo de'i rtags pa yid la mngon du phyogs pa'i ngo bo de sngon du 'gro ba'o //
translated: The union of prƒÅ·πáa and ƒÅyƒÅma, the nature of the two, entering and rising, is the nature of the five winds‚Äô gathering. The sign of that is the nature of the mind‚Äôs inclination toward the object. That is the preliminary.

original: gang gis bsgom par bya zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis bsgom par bya zhe na /
translated: By what is it cultivated?

original: de'i phyir blo ldan zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir blo ldan zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúthe wise.‚Äù

original: gsum pa'i don gyi dang po ste /üîΩblo ldan gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gsum pa'i don gyi dang po ste / blo ldan gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The first of the third caseüîΩmeans ‚Äúthe wise.‚Äù

original: 'od zer gyi thig le bsgom pa la mkhas pa'i phyir snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'od zer gyi thig le bsgom pa la mkhas pa'i phyir snyam du dgongs pa'o //

original: gzhan yang rlung gi de kho na nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yang rlung gi de kho na nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: Furthermore, what is the reality of the wind?

original: de'i phyir ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said to be the nature of the five pristine awarenesses.

original: skal bzang ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can ni me long la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga'i rnam par dag pa nyams dga' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: skal bzang ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can ni me long la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga'i rnam par dag pa nyams dga' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The nature of the five pristine awarenesses of the fortunate one is delightful because of the purity of the five pristine awarenesses of the mirror and so forth.

original: sangs rgyas lnga'i mchog ni zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga'i mchog ni zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The supreme of the five buddhas is because of the nature of the five transcendent lords.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: srog ni sems kyi rdo rje ste //
analyzed: srog ni sems kyi rdo rje ste //
translated: The life-force is the mind-vajra,

original: thur sel rin chen 'byung ldan no //
analyzed: thur sel rin chen 'byung ldan no //
translated: the downward-voiding is the jewel-buddha,

original: gsung gi rdo rje gyen rgyur grags //
analyzed: gsung gi rdo rje gyen rgyur grags //

original: mnyam bcas las kyi rdo rje 'dzin //
analyzed: mnyam bcas las kyi rdo rje 'dzin //
translated: the combined action is the vajra-holder,

original: khyab byed rnam par snang mdzad grags //
analyzed: khyab byed rnam par snang mdzad grags //
translated: the pervading is renowned as Vairochana,

original: sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pa'o //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pa'o // zhes gsungs so //
translated: the five buddhas are completely pure.

original: rin chen lnga yi sbyor ba'i gzugs //
analyzed: rin chen lnga yi sbyor ba'i gzugs //
translated: The form of the union of the five jewels

original: zhes bya ba ni shel dang / aindra n'i la dang / mar ga ta dang / padma r'a ga dang / gser gyi dbye ba rnams kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni shel dang / aindra n'i la dang / mar ga ta dang / padma r'a ga dang / gser gyi dbye ba rnams kyis so //
translated: This is the division of crystal, sapphire, ruby, emerald, and gold.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: srog ni nag po thur sel ser po ste /
analyzed: srog ni nag po thur sel ser po ste /
translated: The life-force is black, the downward-moving is yellow,

original: dmar po gyen rgyu nam mkha' ltar ljang ba //
analyzed: dmar po gyen rgyu nam mkha' ltar ljang ba //
translated: the upward-moving is red, the pervasive is green like space.

original: 'dir ni mnyam pa zhes bya brjod pa ste //üîΩkhyab byed kunda dang mnyam 'dod //
analyzed: 'dir ni mnyam pa zhes bya brjod pa ste // khyab byed kunda dang mnyam 'dod //
translated: Here, the equalizing is described.

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: The pervasive is considered equal to the kundalini.

original: sbyor ba yi sa zhes bya ba ni sems kyi rgyu ba 'gog pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sbyor ba yi sa zhes bya ba ni sems kyi rgyu ba 'gog pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The stage of application is so called because it is the cause for stopping the movement of the mind.

original: 'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid mtshan //
analyzed: 'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid mtshan //
translated: The characteristics are the nature of the five elements.

original: zhes bya ba ni srog ni chu'i khams kyi rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni srog ni chu'i khams kyi rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The life-force is the essence of the purification of the water element.

original: thur sel ni nam mkha'i khams kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: thur sel ni nam mkha'i khams kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: The downward-moving is the essence of the space element.

original: gyen du rgyu ba ni me'i khams kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: gyen du rgyu ba ni me'i khams kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: The upward-moving is the essence of the fire element.

original: mnyam gnas ni rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: mnyam gnas ni rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The equalizing is the nature of the wind element.

original: khyab byed ni sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: khyab byed ni sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The pervasive is the nature of the earth element.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: chu yi khams ni srog ces brjod//
analyzed: chu yi khams ni srog ces brjod//
translated: The water element is called ‚Äúlife.‚Äù

original: @85a * // thur sel nam mkha' de bzhin te //
analyzed: @85a * // thur sel nam mkha' de bzhin te //
translated: The downward-voiding [vƒÅyu] is space,

original: gyen rgyu me nyid du ni brjod //üîΩmnyam gnas de bzhin du ni rlung //
analyzed: gyen rgyu me nyid du ni brjod // mnyam gnas de bzhin du ni rlung //
translated: and the upward-moving is said to be fire.

original: khyab byed sa yi khams yin no //
analyzed: khyab byed sa yi khams yin no //
translated: The pervading [vƒÅyu] is earth.

original: khams lnga rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: khams lnga rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: This is the purification of the five elements.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is.

original: de ltar rlung gi de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rlung gi de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the essence of the reality of the vƒÅyu,

original: de sgom par byed pa'i thabs brjod par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: de sgom par byed pa'i thabs brjod par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: in order to explain the method of meditating on that,

original: de'i yan lag lus la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni thog ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i yan lag lus la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni thog ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: the limbs of that, the yoga of the body, and so on, are explained:üîΩThe ‚Äúbody mudra‚Äù is the support of vajra repetition.

original: lus kyi phyag rgya'i dngos zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis kyis bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgoms pas rdo rje bzlas ba'i rten du gyur pa'i lus med kyang /
analyzed: lus kyi phyag rgya'i dngos zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis kyis bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgoms pas rdo rje bzlas ba'i rten du gyur pa'i lus med kyang /
translated: Although the body that is generated by the two types of creation stage does not exist,

original: mos pas gzung ba'i sgyu ma'i lus la lus kyi phyag rgya'i dngos zhes brjod do //
analyzed: mos pas gzung ba'i sgyu ma'i lus la lus kyi phyag rgya'i dngos zhes brjod do //
translated: the illusory body that is held by devotion is called the ‚Äúbody mudra.‚Äù

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it was said:

original: rdo rje'i bzlas pa 'di yis ni //
analyzed: rdo rje'i bzlas pa 'di yis ni //
translated: By this vajra repetition,

original: snga ma bzhin du brten byas nas //üîΩsgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du brten byas nas // sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
translated: Having relied on the former,

original: las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya // zhes gsungs so //
translated: one should accomplish all actionsüîΩby means of the illusion-like meditative stabilization.

original: ngag gi grangs ni zlos bdag nyid //
analyzed: ngag gi grangs ni zlos bdag nyid //
translated: The number of the speech is the nature of the repetition.

original: ces bya ba ni gcig dang gnyis dang mang po zhes bya ba'i bdag nyid can gyi sngags kyi grangs ni rlung gi de kho na nyid kyi rten gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni gcig dang gnyis dang mang po zhes bya ba'i bdag nyid can gyi sngags kyi grangs ni rlung gi de kho na nyid kyi rten gnyis pa'o //
translated: The number of the mantra, which has the nature of one, two, and many, is the second reliance of the reality of the wind.

original: yid ni rnal 'byor che la dga' //
analyzed: yid ni rnal 'byor che la dga' //
translated: The mind is delighted in the great yoga.

original: zhes bya ba ni sna'i rtse mo rnam pa gsum bsgoms pas 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / ldang ba'i rlung rnams la'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sna'i rtse mo rnam pa gsum bsgoms pas 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / ldang ba'i rlung rnams la'o //
translated: The mind is delighted in the great yoga, which is the wind of exhalation, inhalation, and abiding, by means of the meditation on the three-fold tip of the nose.

original: yi ge gsum dang de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi ngo bo yongs su shes pa ni yid la yongs su shes pa /
analyzed: yi ge gsum dang de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi ngo bo yongs su shes pa ni yid la yongs su shes pa /
translated: The complete knowledge of the three syllables and the nature of the three exalted bodies is the complete knowledge of the mind.

original: yid ni rnal 'byor che la dga' //üîΩzhes bya bar byas nas so //
analyzed: yid ni rnal 'byor che la dga' // zhes bya bar byas nas so //
translated: The mind is delighted in the great yoga.

original: 'di nyid ni rnal 'byor chen po ste /
analyzed: 'di nyid ni rnal 'byor chen po ste /

original: de las gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ro //

original: bsgom pa'i go 'phang mi bzad pa //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i go 'phang mi bzad pa //
translated: The state of meditation is inexhaustible.

original: zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi phyag rgya'i rnam pa gsum gyis rdo rje bzlas pa'i ngo bo 'dug pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi phyag rgya'i rnam pa gsum gyis rdo rje bzlas pa'i ngo bo 'dug pa'i gnas so //
translated: The state of meditation is the abode of sitting, which is the nature of vajra repetition, with the three types of seals of body, speech, and mind.

original: bsgom zhes bya ba ni goms par bya ba'o //üîΩmi zad pa zhes bya ba ni 'di la zad pa ni 'jig pa ste /üîΩde med pas na mi zad pa ste /
analyzed: bsgom zhes bya ba ni goms par bya ba'o // mi zad pa zhes bya ba ni 'di la zad pa ni 'jig pa ste / de med pas na mi zad pa ste /
translated: Meditation is the cultivation of that.üîΩIt is inexhaustible because it is not destroyed.

original: dag 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dag 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is inexhaustible because it is free from the two types of destruction, namely, destruction by the elements and destruction by light.

original: de @85b ltar lus la sogs pa'i sbyor ba bstan nas 'byung ba dang 'jug pa dran pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de @85b ltar lus la sogs pa'i sbyor ba bstan nas 'byung ba dang 'jug pa dran pa brjod pa'i phyir /

original: de'i yan lag mdor bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i yan lag mdor bstan pa ni /

original: bgrang ba yi ni sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: bgrang ba yi ni sbyor ba yis //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: etc.

original: 'chad bzhin pa'i rnam pa drug gis so //
analyzed: 'chad bzhin pa'i rnam pa drug gis so //
translated: By the six aspects that will be explained.

original: bsgom bya zhes bya ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: bsgom bya zhes bya ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: The object of meditation is the nature of the reality of the winds.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: de'i phyir rnal 'byor mchog gis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnal 'byor mchog gis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúby the supreme yogi.‚Äù

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa po'i rnal 'byor pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgom pa la mos pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa po'i rnal 'byor pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgom pa la mos pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one who is free from the characteristics of a yogi who cultivates the stage of generation, who is devoted to the cultivation of the stage of completion.

original: rtag ces bya ba ni thun phyed kyi dus kyi mthar thug pa'am /
analyzed: rtag ces bya ba ni thun phyed kyi dus kyi mthar thug pa'am /
translated: ‚Äú Always‚Äù means until the end of the half-period,

analyzed: thun mtshams bzhir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: or the meaning is that it is done in the four periods.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /üîΩbgrang bya'i grangs kyi dbugs kyis ni //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir / bgrang bya'i grangs kyi dbugs kyis ni //
translated: For that very reason,

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: it is said, ‚Äúby the number of breaths.‚Äù

original: bgrang bya ni grangs so //
analyzed: bgrang bya ni grangs so //
translated: ‚Äú Number‚Äù means count.

original: dbugs kyi grangs kyis zhes bya ba ni lhag pa dang chad pa'i dbugs kyi grangs spangs pa dang / 'dres pa'i grangs yongs su spangs nas /
analyzed: dbugs kyi grangs kyis zhes bya ba ni lhag pa dang chad pa'i dbugs kyi grangs spangs pa dang / 'dres pa'i grangs yongs su spangs nas /
translated: ‚Äú By the number of breaths‚Äù means that, having abandoned the number of breaths that are excessive or deficient, and having abandoned the mixed number,

original: nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i dbugs kyi grangs kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i dbugs kyi grangs kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: it is the nature of the number of breaths that is twenty-one thousand and six hundred.

original: de bzhin dbugs ni rnam spyod bya //
analyzed: de bzhin dbugs ni rnam spyod bya //
translated: ‚Äú Likewise, one should practice the breath.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni 'dis ni rjes su 'gro ba bshad de //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'dis ni rjes su 'gro ba bshad de //
translated: This explains the forward sequence.

original: dkyil 'khor re re las lhag ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi chas bgrangs pas dgu brgya dgu brgya'i ngo bo'i dbugs rgyu ba'i grangs kyis 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas thun re re la brgya phrag nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi grangs kyi mtshan nyid can rlung ni rnam spyod
analyzed: dkyil 'khor re re las lhag ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi chas bgrangs pas dgu brgya dgu brgya'i ngo bo'i dbugs rgyu ba'i grangs kyis 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas thun re re la brgya phrag nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi grangs kyi mtshan nyid can rlung ni rnam spyod
translated: The winds are called ‚Äúthe conduct‚Äù because they enter and so forth by the number of breaths that are the essence of the nine hundred and ninety-nine sets of implements of the remaining ma·πá·∏çalas, each of which is more than a single ma·πá·∏çala.

original: pa zhes bya ba ni 'dis ni gnas bstan pa ste /
analyzed: pa zhes bya ba ni 'dis ni gnas bstan pa ste /

original: rtog pa dang zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: rtog pa dang zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: It is connected with ‚Äúconcepts.‚Äù

original: dkyil 'khor re re la rtsa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rgyu ba dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa'i gnas pa'i rnam par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor re re la rtsa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rgyu ba dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa'i gnas pa'i rnam par spyod pa'o //
translated: The conduct of the winds abiding in the arising and entering of the breath is the movement of the ma·πá·∏çala of nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s in each ma·πá·∏çala.

original: dus kyi dbye ba'i rtog pa dang // zhes bya ba ni 'dis ni mtshan nyid gsungs te ;
analyzed: dus kyi dbye ba'i rtog pa dang // zhes bya ba ni 'dis ni mtshan nyid gsungs te ;
translated: ‚ÄúThe time of the divisions of concepts‚Äù indicates the definition.

analyzed: gnas so sor rnam par rtog pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyi rgyu ba'i ngo bo dbye ba'i dus te des so //
translated: The time of the divisions of the movement of the one hundred and eight concepts of the individual locations is by that.

original: rtog pa zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rtog pa zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúConcepts‚Äù is a term that indicates.

original: rlung rnams kyis ni zlog pa dang // zhes bya ba ni 'dis ni ldog pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rlung rnams kyis ni zlog pa dang // zhes bya ba ni 'dis ni ldog pa gsungs te /

original: rtog pa dang bcas pa'i ngo bo bzlog pas @86a * //
analyzed: rtog pa dang bcas pa'i ngo bo bzlog pas @86a * //
translated: By reversing the form with thought,

analyzed: pas rtog pa med pa'i ngo bo las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor gyi ngo bos rnam par ldog pa zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: rtog pa dang bcas spangs pa ste //
analyzed: rtog pa dang bcas spangs pa ste //

original: zhes bya ba ni 'dis ni rnam par dag pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'dis ni rnam par dag pa gsungs so //

original: rtog pa dang bcas pa bzlog nas /
analyzed: rtog pa dang bcas pa bzlog nas /

analyzed: rlung gi ngo bo gcig pu gnas pa la ngal bas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the meaning is that it abides in the form of the single wind.

original: de ltar rnam pa drug gis zhes bya ba ni rigs pa 'dis so //
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa drug gis zhes bya ba ni rigs pa 'dis so //

original: drug gis zhes bya ba ni rnam pa drug gis so //
analyzed: drug gis zhes bya ba ni rnam pa drug gis so //

analyzed: mdor bsdus zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdus pa nyid kyis so ;

analyzed: /'byung dang rngub par rjes su dran // zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'i rlung ni rngub pa'o //

original: 'gro ba'i rlung ni 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i rlung ni 'byung ba'o //

analyzed: de ltar 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i rjes su dran pa mdor bstan pa bshad nas /

analyzed: de'i yan lag bgrang ba'i ngo bo bstan pa ni /
translated: the nature of the enumeration of its branches is taught.

original: thog mar srog dang thur sel rnams //
analyzed: thog mar srog dang thur sel rnams //
translated: First, the life-force and downward-voiding

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

translated: First, one focuses on the illusory body arisen from imagination.

original: srog dang thur sel chad pa dang lhag pa dang 'dres pa'i grangs yongs su dor nas so //
analyzed: srog dang thur sel chad pa dang lhag pa dang 'dres pa'i grangs yongs su dor nas so //
translated: Having abandoned the enumeration of the life-force and downward-voiding vƒÅyus that are cut, increased, and mixed,

analyzed: nyi khri zhes bya ba ni stong phrag nyi shu'o //

analyzed: nyin mtshan grangs ni zhes bya ba ni nyin mtshan gyi grangs kyis so //

original: dus kyi nges pa brjod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: dus kyi nges pa brjod pa'i phyir //
translated: in order to state the determination of the time,üîΩhe says,

original: ji srid grangs ni thob pa'i gnas //

analyzed: blo la de phyogs lhung ba'i phyir //

analyzed: zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: de'i rgyu ni skyed byed rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: de ltar rnam dag gi rgyas par bshad pa rang gi ngo bo bstan nas /

analyzed: zhes gsungs te /

analyzed: rnam par rtog pa las log pa'i bdag nyid can gyis so //

original: nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun la //
analyzed: nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun la //

original: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //

analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa drug gis rgyas par bshad pa bstan to //

analyzed: de ltar rnam pa gnyis kyis de bsgom pa'i thabs bstan nas / rlung gi de kho na nyid rgyas par bshad @89a * //
translated: Having thus taught the method of cultivating it by means of two topics,

analyzed: pa brjod pa'i phyir / de'i yan lag sems rtse gcig pa'i rgyu gsungs pa /
translated: in order to explain the extensive explanation of the reality of the vƒÅyu,üîΩthe cause of the one-pointed mind, which is a branch of that, is stated:

analyzed: rlung gi de kho na nyid la brten pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe cause of the one-pointed mind is based on the reality of the vƒÅyu.‚Äù

original: sngar bshad pa'i las so //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i las so //

analyzed: g-yeng ba'i sems zhes bya ba ni yul la mngon du phyogs pas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems kyi rgyud ni gang zag rnams kyi'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe distracted mind‚Äù is the continuum of the mind that is not equipoised because it is directed toward an object.

analyzed: dag par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ba'o //

original: rten ni gnas so //
analyzed: rten ni gnas so //

analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir de lta bur gyur pa'i yon tan rlung gi de kho na nyid yod de /
translated: ‚ÄúIn that‚Äù means ‚Äúbecause the reality of the vƒÅyu has such qualities.‚Äù

original: de bas na rtse gcig sems kyis ni zhes bya bas ni rnam par g-yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis so //
analyzed: de bas na rtse gcig sems kyis ni zhes bya bas ni rnam par g-yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis so //
translated: Therefore, with a one-pointed mind means with a mind free from distraction.

original: dag par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: dag par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ba'o //

analyzed: rlung gi stobs kyis bshad ma thag pa'i brgya rtsa brgyad kyi rnam par rtog pa rgyu ba log nas so //
translated: By the power of the wind means by the power of the wind, which is the reversal of the movement of the eighty-eight conceptions just explained.

analyzed: de kho na nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni de ma thag par bshad pa'i 'byung ba dang rngub pa'i rjes su dran pa'i mtshan nyid can no ;
translated: By reality means by the reality just explained, which is the mindfulness of inhalation and exhalation.

analyzed: / rlung gi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog / ces bya ba ni mchog gi ngo bo rdo rje bzlas pa'i sgrub pas so //

analyzed: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i gdams ngag gi stobs kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Correct means by the power of unmistaken instruction.

original: gsal zhes bya ba ni bsgom bzhin pa'i rab tu mthar phyin par gsal bar snang ba'i phyir ro /
analyzed: gsal zhes bya ba ni bsgom bzhin pa'i rab tu mthar phyin par gsal bar snang ba'i phyir ro /
translated: Clear means clear appearance, which is the culmination of meditation.

original: de ltar sems rtse gcig pa'i rgyu ba brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar sems rtse gcig pa'i rgyu ba brjod nas /
translated: Having thus described the movement of one-pointedness of mind,

original: de'i don du dpe bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i don du dpe bstan pa'i phyir /

analyzed: khang bzangs byed pa bzhin du ni //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: etc.

original: khang pa gsar pa byed pa po la sogs pas so //
analyzed: khang pa gsar pa byed pa po la sogs pas so //

original: bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
analyzed: bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
